attrs.name: form.widget
attrs.value:
<modal id="modalPatient" editor_id="nazzfqkhig1457012849120">
  <option output="html" option_name="modal_size" value="large"/>
  <modal_head title="Identifier le patient"/>
  <modal_body>
    <form_row>
      <label dataset="cas" field="pat_ddn" class="col-sm-4">
        <option output="html" option_name="label" value="Date de naissance"/>
      </label>
      <value dataset="cas" field="pat_ddn" mode="rw" class="col-sm-8">
        <option output="html" option_name="widget" value="WidgetDateAdvanced"/>
        <option output="html" option_name="start_view" value="decade"/>
      </value>
    </form_row>
    <form_row class="id_pat">
      <label dataset="cas" field="id_pat" class="col-sm-4">
        <option output="html" option_name="label" value="Nom ou prénom"/>
      </label>
      <search search_param="search_string" search_dataset="search_patient" target_dataset="cas" class="col-sm-8">
        <option output="html" option_name="widget" value="WidgetSearch"/>
        <option output="html" option_name="max_results" value="20"/>
      </search>
    </form_row>
    <box class="col-sm-6 col-sm-offset-6">
      <option output="html" option_name="show_on" value="{cas.pat_ddn} !== null" />
      <button action="stand_by" label="Patient non référencé ?">
        <option output="html" option_name="close_modal" value="true"/>
        <redirection module="form" ctrl="frame" action="get">
          <params>
            <value alias="id">61</value>
          </params>
        </redirection>
      </button>
    </box>
  </modal_body>
  <modal_foot>
    <button label="Annuler" action="cancel_modal">
		<option output="html" option_name="close_modal" value="true"/>
	</button>
    <button label="Valider" class="btn-primary">
      <option output="html" option_name="close_modal" value="true" />
    </button>
  </modal_foot>
</modal>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="search_patient" table_name="{pj}_pat_data" varset_name="pat" table_alias="pat" editor_id="qdytkdwkkr1457087913486">
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="pat"/>

  <match sql="{pat.pat_nom_naissance} LIKE '{search_string}%' OR        {pat.pat_prenom} LIKE '{search_string}%' OR         {pat.pat_nom_usuel} LIKE '{search_string}%'" optional="true" onset="dont_ignore_conditions">
    <field field_name="pat_nom_naissance" table_name="pat" alias="pat.pat_nom_naissance"/>
    <field field_name="pat_prenom" table_name="pat" alias="pat.pat_prenom"/>
    <field field_name="pat_nom_usuel" table_name="pat" alias="pat.pat_nom_usuel"/>
    <variable alias="search_string" default="NULL" type="search">
      <entry type="param" name="search_string"/>
    </variable>
  </match>

  <column sql="CONCAT( {pat.pat_prenom}, ' ', {pat.pat_nom_naissance} )" alias="head" type="string" length="150">
    <field table_name="pat" field_name="pat_prenom" alias="pat.pat_prenom"/>
    <field table_name="pat" field_name="pat_nom_naissance" alias="pat.pat_nom_naissance"/>
  </column>

  <column sql="CONCAT('Né', IF({pat.pat_sexe} = '255', 'é ', ' '), ' le ', DATE_FORMAT( {pat.pat_ddn}, '%d/%m/%Y' ) )" alias="body" type="string" length="150">
    <field table_name="pat" field_name="pat_sexe" alias="pat.pat_sexe"/>
    <field table_name="pat" field_name="pat_ddn" alias="pat.pat_ddn"/>
  </column>

  <condition sql="{pat.pat_ddn}={cas.pat_ddn}">
    <field field_name="pat_ddn" table_name="pat" alias="pat.pat_ddn"/>
    <variable alias="cas.pat_ddn" default="NULL">
      <entry type="param" name="pat_ddn"/>
      <entry type="dataset" name="cas" field="pat_ddn" row="current" />
    </variable>
  </condition>

  <condition sql="1=1">
    <variable alias="key" default="NULL">
      <entry type="param" name="key"/>
      <entry type="dataset" name="cas" field="cas_numero" row="current"/>
    </variable>
  </condition>

  <column sql="CONCAT( {pat.pat_prenom}, ' ', {pat.pat_nom_naissance} )" alias="field_value" type="string">
    <field table_name="pat" field_name="pat_prenom" alias="pat.pat_prenom"/>
    <field table_name="pat" field_name="pat_nom_naissance" alias="pat.pat_nom_naissance"/>
  </column>

</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="search_unite" table_name="{pj}_unite_data" varset_name="unite" table_alias="unite">
  
  	<!-- Dataquery pour la recherche d'unité -->
  	
  	<!-- Conditions de recherche -->
	<match sql="{unite.unite_libelle_long} LIKE '%{search_string}%' OR
				{unite.unite_libelle_court} LIKE '%{search_string}%' OR 
				{unite.unite_code_credo} LIKE '%{search_string}%' OR 
				{unite.unite_commune} LIKE '%{search_string}%'" optional="true">
		<field field_name="unite_libelle_long" table_name="unite" alias="unite.unite_libelle_long"/>
		<field field_name="unite_libelle_court" table_name="unite" alias="unite.unite_libelle_court"/>
		<field field_name="unite_code_credo" table_name="unite" alias="unite.unite_code_credo"/>
		<field field_name="unite_commune" table_name="unite" alias="unite.unite_commune"/>
		<variable alias="search_string" default="NULL" type="search">
			<entry type="param" name="search_string"/>
		</variable>
	</match>
  
  	<!-- Eléments à afficher pour chaque résultat de recherche -->
	<column sql="{unite.unite_libelle_long}" alias="head" type="string" length="200">
		<field table_name="unite" field_name="unite_libelle_long" alias="unite.unite_libelle_long"/>
	</column>
	<column sql="CONCAT({unite.unite_cp},' ',{unite.unite_commune},' (',{dico.label},')')" alias="body" type="string">
		<field table_name="unite" field_name="unite_cp" alias="unite.unite_cp"/>
		<field table_name="unite" field_name="unite_commune" alias="unite.unite_commune"/>
    	<field table_name="dico" field_name="label" alias="dico.label"/>  <!-- Le libellé du pays -->
  	</column>
  
  	<!-- Lien fsd-unité -->
	<condition sql="{unite.id_data}={fda.id_unite}">
		<field field_name="id_data" table_name="unite" alias="unite.id_data"/>
		<variable alias="fda.id_unite" default="NULL">
			<entry type="dataset" name="fsd" field="id_unite" row="current" />
		</variable>
	</condition>
  
  	<!-- Conditon factice pour passer la clef du cas en paramètre (spécificité du merger) -->
    <condition sql="1=1">
      <variable alias="key" default="NULL">
        <entry type="param" name="key"/>
        <entry type="dataset" name="cas" field="cas_numero" row="current"/>
      </variable>
    </condition>
  
  	<!-- Jointure pour obtenir le libellé du pays et non son id_data -->
  	<join detail_table="{pj}_dico_data" detail_alias="dico" sql="{dico.id_data} = {unite.unite_pays}" type="left" mode="r">
      <field table_name="dico" field_name="id_data" alias="dico.id_data"/>
      <field table_name="unite" field_name="unite_pays" alias="unite.unite_pays"/>
    </join>
  
  	<!-- Jointure pour obtenir l'armée en fonction de l'arme de l'unité -->
  	<join detail_table="{pj}_arme_data" detail_alias="arme" sql="{arme.id_data} = {unite.id_arme}" type="left" mode="r">
      <field table_name="arme" field_name="id_data" alias="arme.id_data"/>
      <field table_name="unite" field_name="id_arme" alias="unite.id_arme"/>
    </join>
  
  	<!-- Autres colonnes dont la field_value qui détermine ce qu'il faut afficher dans le champ -->
	<column sql="{unite.id_data}" alias="id_unite">
		<field table_name="unite" field_name="id_data" alias="unite.id_data"/>
	</column>
	<column sql="{unite.unite_libelle_long}" alias="field_value">
		<field table_name="unite" field_name="unite_libelle_long" alias="unite.unite_libelle_long"/>
	</column>
  
  	<!-- Colonnes pour le remplissage du référentiel unité -->
  	<column sql="{unite.unite_pays}" alias="fsd_pays">
      <field table_name="unite" field_name="unite_pays" alias="unite.unite_pays"/>
	</column>
  	<column sql="{arme.arme_armee}" alias="fsd_armee">
      <field table_name="arme" field_name="arme_armee" alias="arme.arme_armee"/>
	</column>
  
</dataquery>

</joins>

attrs.value:
<dataquery id="contact" table_name="{pj}_user_data" varset_name="user" table_alias="u">

	<column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="u"/>

	<column sql="CONCAT_WS( ' ', {code_grade}, {u.firstname}, {u.lastname})" alias="label" type="string" >
		<field table_name="d" field_name="code" alias="code_grade" mode="r"/>
		<field table_name="u" field_name="firstname" alias="u.firstname" mode="r"/>
		<field table_name="u" field_name="lastname" alias="u.lastname" mode="r"/>
	</column>
	
	<joins>
	
		<join detail_table="{pj}_alerte_user_data" detail_alias="au" sql="{u.id_data}={au.id_user}">
			<field table_name="u" field_name="id_data" alias="u.id_data"/>
			<field table_name="au" field_name="id_user" alias="au.id_user"/>
		</join>
		
		<join detail_table="{pj}_dico_data" detail_alias="d" sql="{d.id_data}={u.grade_ssa}">
			<field table_name="d" field_name="id_data" alias="d.id_data"/>
			<field table_name="u" field_name="grade_ssa" alias="u.grade_ssa"/>
		</join>
		
	</joins>
	
	<condition sql="{au.id_alerte}={a.id_data}">
		<field table_name="au" field_name="id_alerte" alias="au.id_alerte"/>
		<variable alias="a.id_data" default="0">
			<entry type="param" name="id_alerte" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="alerte" row="current" field="id_data" />
		</variable>
	</condition>


</dataquery>

<form_row>
  
  <button action="save" label="Rouvrir l'alerte" class="btn-primary pull-right" >
	<option output="html" option_name="show_on" value="{alerte.alerte_statut} == 'CL' && {user->access}.indexOf('alerte.rouvrir') != -1"/>
	<option output="html" option_name="additional_params" value="/set_alerte_statut/rouvert"/>
    <!-- Redirection vers Alerte (Infos générales) -->
	<redirection module="form" ctrl="frame" action="get">
		<params>
			<value alias="sid">ymjrpditfb1456316174222</value>
			<dataset dataset_name="alerte" field="id_data" alias="id_data"/>
		</params>
	</redirection>
  </button>
  
  <button label="Clôturer l'alerte" action="modal" target="modal_alerte_cloture" class="btn-danger pull-right">
	<option output="html" option_name="show_on" value="{alerte.alerte_statut} == 'EC' && {user->access}.indexOf('alerte.fermer') != -1"/>
  </button>
  
  <button label="Enregistrer" action="save" class="btn-primary pull-right">
    <option output="html" option_name="show_on" value="{alerte.alerte_statut} == 'EC'"/>
  </button>
  
  <button label="Voir la fiche synthetique" action="back" class="pull-right"/>

  <modal id="modal_alerte_cloture">
	<modal_head title="Clôture de l'alerte"/>
	<modal_body>
		<form_row>
			<label dataset="alerte" field="alerte_com_cloture" class="col-xs-3 text-right"/>
			<value dataset="alerte" field="alerte_com_cloture" mode="rw" class="col-xs-9 text-left"/>
		</form_row>
	</modal_body>
	<modal_foot>
		<button label="Annuler" action="cancel_modal">
			<option output="html" option_name="close_modal" value="true"/>
		</button>
		<button label="Sauvegarder" action="save">
			<option output="html" option_name="close_modal" value="true"/>
			<option output="html" option_name="additional_params" value="set_alerte_statut/cloture"/>
            <!-- Redirection vers Alerte (Infos générales) -->
            <redirection module="form" ctrl="frame" action="get">
                <params>
                    <value alias="sid">ymjrpditfb1456316174222</value>
                    <dataset dataset_name="alerte" field="id_data" alias="id_data"/>
                </params>
            </redirection>
		</button>
	</modal_foot>
  </modal>
</form_row>

<dataquery id="evt" table_name="{pj}_evt_data" varset_name="evt" table_alias="e">
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="e"/>
  <column_simple field_name="evt_code" table_name="e"/>
  <column_simple field_name="evt_libelle_court" table_name="e"/>
  <column sql="CONCAT({e.evt_code}, ' - ', {e.evt_libelle_court})" alias="label" type="string">
    <field table_name="e" field_name="evt_code" alias="e.evt_code"/>
    <field table_name="e" field_name="evt_libelle_court" alias="e.evt_libelle_court"/>
  </column>
  <condition sql="( {search_code} IS NOT NULL AND {e.id_data} = {search_code} )">
    <field field_name="id_data" table_name="e" alias="e.id_data"/>
    <variable alias="search_code" default="NULL">
      <entry type="param" name="search_code"/>
      <entry type="dataset" name="alerte" field="id_evt" row="current"/>
    </variable>
  </condition>
</dataquery>

    <field table_name="event" field_name="evt_code" alias="event.evt_code"/>
    <field table_name="event" field_name="evt_libelle_court" alias="event.evt_libelle_court"/>
  </column>
  <order_by sql="{event.evt_code}">

</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="upload" table_name="{pj}_doc_reference_f_data" varset_name="doc_reference_f" table_alias="upload">

	<condition sql="{upload.id_ext}={doc_reference.id_data}">
		<field field_name="id_ext" table_name="upload" alias="upload.id_ext"/>
		<variable alias="doc_reference.id_data" default="NULL">
			<entry type="dataset" name="doc_reference" field="id_data" row="current" />
			<entry type="param" name="id_doc_reference" />
		</variable>
	</condition>
	
	<join detail_table="{pj}_file_data" detail_varset_name="file" detail_alias="f" sql="{upload.id_file}={f.id_data}" type="left" mode="rw">
		<field table_name="upload" field_name="id_file" alias="upload.id_file"/>
		<field table_name="f" field_name="id_data" alias="f.id_data"/>
	</join>
	
	<column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="upload"/>
	<column_simple field_name="id_ext" table_name="upload"/>
	<column_simple field_name="id_file" table_name="upload"/>
	<column_simple field_name="original_name" table_name="f"/>
	<column_simple field_name="status" table_name="f"/>
	
	<variables>
		<variable alias="id_doc_reference" default="NULL" target_column="id_ext">
			<entry type="dataset" name="doc_reference" field="id_data" row="current"/>
		</variable>
	</variables>
	
</dataquery>

			</field>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="str" table_name="{pj}_struct_data" varset_name="struct" table_alias="str" mode="rw">
	<column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="str" />
	<column_simple field_name="str_code_cespa" table_name="str" />
	<column_simple field_name="str_code_credo" table_name="str" />
	<column_simple field_name="str_libelle_long" table_name="str" />
	<column_simple field_name="str_libelle_court" table_name="str" />
  	<column sql="IF({str.str_declare} = 1, 'Oui', '')" alias="declare" type="string">
		<field table_name="str" field_name="str_declare" alias="str.str_declare"/>
	</column>
	<column_simple field_name="name" table_name="g" />

	<condition sql=" ( {s_cespa} IS NULL OR {str.str_code_cespa} LIKE CONCAT('%',{s_cespa},'%') ) AND
						 ( {s_credo} IS NULL OR {str.str_code_credo} LIKE CONCAT('%',{s_credo},'%') ) AND
						 ( {s_nom} IS NULL OR {str.str_libelle_long} LIKE CONCAT('%',{s_nom},'%') OR {str.str_libelle_court} LIKE CONCAT('%',{s_nom},'%') ) AND
						 ( {s_declare} IS NULL OR {str.str_declare} = {s_declare} )">
		<field field_name="str_code_cespa" table_name="str" alias="str.str_code_cespa" />
		<field field_name="str_code_credo" table_name="str" alias="str.str_code_credo" />
		<field field_name="str_libelle_long" table_name="str" alias="str.str_libelle_long" />
		<field field_name="str_libelle_court" table_name="str" alias="str.str_libelle_court" />
		<field field_name="str_declare" table_name="str" alias="str.str_declare" />

		<variable alias="s_cespa" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_cespa" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_cespa" row="current" />
		</variable>
		<variable alias="s_credo" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_credo" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_credo" row="current" />
		</variable>
		<variable alias="s_nom" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_nom" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_nom" row="current" />
		</variable>
		<variable alias="s_declare" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_declare" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_declare" row="current" />
		</variable>

	</condition>
	
	<join detail_table="{pj}_pj_group" detail_alias="g" sql="{str.str_id_group}={g.id_group}" type="left" mode="r">
		<field table_name="g" field_name="id_group" alias="g.id_group"/>
		<field table_name="str" field_name="str_id_group" alias="str.str_id_group"/>
	</join>
	
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.widget
attrs.value:
<form_row>
  <button label="Retour à la liste des MEH" action="exit">
    <redirection module="form" ctrl="frame" action="get">
      <params>
        <value alias="sid">bcswizzant1456829079902</value>
      </params>
    </redirection>
  </button>

  <button action="save" label="Déclarer le MEH" class="btn btn-primary pull-right" >
    <option output="html" option_name="show_on" value="({meh.meh_statut} == 'ndecl' || {meh.meh_statut} == 'corr') && {user->access}.indexOf('meh.declarer') != -1 "/>
    <option output="html" option_name="additional_params" value="/set_meh_statut/decl"/>
    <redirection module="declaration" ctrl="meh" action="get">
      <params>
        <value alias="id">54</value>
        <dataset dataset_name="meh" field="id_data" alias="id_data"/>
      </params>
    </redirection>
  </button>

  <button action="save" label="Valider le MEH" class="btn btn-primary pull-right" >
    <option output="html" option_name="show_on" value="{meh.meh_statut} == 'decl' && {user->access}.indexOf('meh.valider') != -1"/>
    <option output="html" option_name="additional_params" value="/set_meh_statut/valid"/>
    <redirection module="form" ctrl="frame" action="get">
      <params>
        <value alias="id">54</value>
        <dataset dataset_name="meh" field="id_data" alias="id_data"/>
      </params>
    </redirection>
  </button>

  <button label="Demander une correction" action="modal" target="modal_meh_correction" class="btn-modal btn-danger pull-right">
    <option output="html" option_name="show_on" value="{meh.meh_statut} == 'decl' && {user->access}.indexOf('meh.corriger') != -1"/>
  </button>

  <button action="save" label="Cas déclarés du MEH" class="pull-right">
    <redirection module="form" ctrl="frame" action="get">
      <params>
        <dataset dataset_name="meh" field="id_data" alias="id_meh"/>
        <value alias="id">101</value>
      </params>
    </redirection>
  </button>


  <modal id="modal_meh_correction">
    <modal_head title="Demander une correction du MEH"/>
    <modal_body>
      <form_row>
        <label dataset="meh" field="meh_correction" class="col-xs-3 text-right"/>
        <value dataset="meh" field="meh_correction" mode="rw" class="col-xs-9 text-left"/>
      </form_row>
    </modal_body>
    <modal_foot>
      <button label="Annuler" action="cancel_modal">
        <option output="html" option_name="close_modal" value="true"/>
      </button>
      <button label="Sauvegarder" action="save">
        <option output="html" option_name="close_modal" value="true"/>
        <option output="html" option_name="additional_params" value="set_meh_statut/corr"/>
        <redirection module="controle" ctrl="relance" action="get">
          <params>
            <value alias="id">87</value>
            <value alias="rel_sujet">404</value>
            <value alias="rel_moyen_comm">402</value>
            <dataset dataset_name="meh" field="id_data" alias="id_meh"/>
          </params>
        </redirection>
      </button>
    </modal_foot>
  </modal>


  <modal id="modal_meh_redeclarer">
    <modal_head title="Demander une correction du MEH"/>
    <modal_body>
      <form_row>
        <label dataset="meh" field="meh_correction" class="col-xs-3 text-right"/>
        <value dataset="meh" field="meh_correction" mode="r" class="col-xs-9 text-left"/>
      </form_row>
      <form_row>
        <label dataset="meh_reponse" field="text" class="col-xs-3 text-right"/>
        <value dataset="meh_reponse" field="text" mode="r" class="col-xs-9 text-left"/>
      </form_row>
    </modal_body>
    <modal_foot>
      <button label="Annuler" action="cancel_modal">
        <option output="html" option_name="close_modal" value="true"/>
      </button>
      <button label="Sauvegarder" action="save">
        <option output="html" option_name="close_modal" value="true"/>
        <option output="html" option_name="additional_params" value="set_meh_statut/corr"/>
        <redirection module="controle" ctrl="relance" action="get">
          <params>
            <value alias="id">87</value>
            <value alias="rel_sujet">404</value>
            <value alias="rel_moyen_comm">402</value>
            <dataset dataset_name="meh" field="id_data" alias="id_meh"/>
          </params>
        </redirection>
      </button>
    </modal_foot>
  </modal>  
</form_row>

<column sql="CONCAT('Semaine ', {meh.meh_semaine}, ' - ', {meh.meh_annee}, ' du ', DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT({meh.meh_annee}, {meh.meh_semaine}, ' Monday'), '%x%v %W'), '%d/%m%/%Y'), ' au ', DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT({meh.meh_annee}, {meh.meh_semaine}, ' Sunday'), '%x%v %W'), '%d/%m%/%Y') )" alias="meh_date_display" type="string">
	<field table_name="ede" field_name="meh_annee" alias="meh.meh_annee"/>

</column>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="periodes" table_name="{pj}_prd_data" varset_name="prd" table_alias="prd">
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="prd"/>
  <column_simple field_name="prd_label" table_name="prd"/>
  <column_simple field_name="prd_start" table_name="prd"/>
  <column_simple field_name="prd_end" table_name="prd"/>
  <condition sql="{prd.id_struct}={_id_struct}">
    <field field_name="id_struct" table_name="prd" alias="prd.id_struct"/>
    <variable alias="_id_struct" default="NULL">
      <entry type="param" name="id_struct"/>
      <entry type="dataset" name="meh" field="id_struct" row="current" />
    </variable>
  </condition>
  <condition sql="CURRENT_DATE <= {prd.prd_end}">
    <field field_name="prd_end" table_name="prd" alias="prd.prd_end"/>
  </condition>
  <order_by sql="{prd.prd_end}">
    <field table_name="prd" field_name="prd_end" alias="prd.prd_end"/>
  </order_by>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery.main.condition
attrs.value:
<condition sql=" ( {search_type} = 'num' AND ({s_num} IS NULL OR {meh.meh_num} = {s_num}) ) OR
				(
					( {search_type} = 'multiple' ) AND 
					( {s_groupe} IS NULL OR {g.id_group} = {s_groupe} ) AND

					( {s_statut} IS NULL OR {meh.meh_statut} = {s_statut} ) AND
					( {s_annee} IS NULL OR {meh.meh_annee} = {s_annee} ) AND
					( {s_semaine} IS NULL OR {meh.meh_semaine} = {s_semaine} ) AND

					( {s_date_min} IS NULL OR {meh.meh_date} >= {s_date_min} ) AND
					( {s_date_max} IS NULL OR DATE_ADD({meh.meh_date}, INTERVAL +6 DAY) < {s_date_max} )
				)">

		<field field_name="id_data" table_name="ffa" alias="meh.id_data" />
		<field field_name="id_group" table_name="g" alias="g.id_group"/>
		<field field_name="meh_num" table_name="ffa" alias="meh.meh_num" />
		<field field_name="meh_statut" table_name="ffa" alias="meh.meh_statut" />
		<field field_name="meh_annee" table_name="ffa" alias="meh.meh_annee" />
		<field field_name="meh_semaine" table_name="ffa" alias="meh.meh_semaine" />
		<field field_name="meh_date" table_name="ffa" alias="meh.meh_date" />

		<variable alias="search_type" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="search_type"/>
		</variable>

		<variable alias="s_groupe" default="null">
			<entry type="param" name="s_groupe" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_groupe" row="current" />
		</variable>
		<variable alias="s_num" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_num" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search_num" field="s_num" row="current" />
		</variable>
		<variable alias="s_statut" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_statut" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_statut" row="current" />
		</variable>
		<variable alias="s_annee" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_annee" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_annee" row="current" />
		</variable>
		<variable alias="s_semaine" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_semaine" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_semaine" row="current" />
		</variable>
		<variable alias="s_date_min" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_date_min" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_date_min" row="current" />
		</variable>

attrs.name: form.dataquery.main.joins
attrs.value:
<joins>
  <join detail_table="{pj}_meh_data_group" detail_alias="g" sql="{g.id_data}={meh.id_data}" type="inner" mode="r">
    <field table_name="g" field_name="id_data" alias="g.id_data"/>
    <field table_name="ffa" field_name="id_data" alias="meh.id_data"/>
  </join>
  <join detail_table="{pj}_struct_data" detail_alias="s" sql="{s.id_data}={meh.id_struct}" type="left" mode="r">
    <field table_name="s" field_name="id_data" alias="s.id_data"/>
    <field table_name="ffa" field_name="id_struct" alias="meh.id_struct"/>
  </join>
  <join detail_table="{pj}_cas_data" detail_alias="c" sql="{c.id_struct}={m.id_struct} AND DATE_FORMAT({c.cas_date}, '%x%v') = CONCAT({m.meh_annee}, {m.meh_semaine})" type="left" mode="r">
    <field table_name="c" field_name="id_struct" alias="c.id_struct"/>
    <field table_name="c" field_name="cas_date" alias="c.cas_date"/>
    <field table_name="ffa" field_name="id_struct" alias="m.id_struct"/>
    <field table_name="ffa" field_name="meh_annee" alias="m.meh_annee"/>
    <field table_name="ffa" field_name="meh_semaine" alias="m.meh_semaine"/>
  </join>
  <join detail_table="{pj}_fsd_data" detail_alias="f" sql="{f.id_cas}={c.id_data} AND {f.fsd_statut} IN (241, 244)" type="left" mode="r">
    <field table_name="c" field_name="id_data" alias="c.id_data"/>
    <field table_name="f" field_name="id_cas" alias="f.id_cas"/>
    <field table_name="f" field_name="fsd_statut" alias="f.fsd_statut"/>
  </join>
</joins>

attrs.value: form_gen_meh

Si une FSD est au statut "A corriger", un mail automatique est envoyé au déclarant pour lui signaler que sa FSD a été rejetée. L'objet et le corps du mail sont définis ici. Ensuite une relance téléphonique est proposée tous les Y2 jours jusqu'à correction de la FSD.

attrs.name: param_relance_fsd_a_corrige_delai
attrs.label: Délai en nombre de jours entre deux relances téléphoniques (Y2) :

attrs.value: Si une FSD est au statut "Non finalisée", le système attend X1 jours avant de proposer une première relance. Puis les relances sont proposées tous les Y1 jours. Les Z1 premières relances s'effectuent par mail, les suivantes sont des relances téléphoniques. L'objet et le corps du mail de relance sont définis ici.

attrs.name: param_relance_fsd_nb_jour_1ere_relance
attrs.label: Nombre de jours avant la première relance (X1) :

attrs.name: param_relance_fsd_non_recue_delai
attrs.label: Délai en nombre de jours entre deux relances (Y1) :

attrs.name: param_relance_fsd_nb_jour_relances_mail
attrs.label: Nombre de jours des premières relances par mail (Z1) :

attrs.value: Si un MEH est au statut "A corriger", un mail automatique est envoyé au déclarant pour lui signaler que son MEH a été rejeté. L'objet et le corps du mail sont définis ici. Ensuite une relance téléphonique est proposée tous les Y4 jours jusqu'à correction du MEH.

attrs.name: param_relance_meh_a_corrige_delai
attrs.label: Délai en nombre de jours entre deux relances téléphoniques (Y4) :

attrs.value: Si un MEH est au statut "Non déclaré" en fin de semaine, le système attend X3 jours avant de proposer une première relance téléphonique. Puis des relances sont proposées pendant Z3 jours avec une relance tous les Y3 jours. Ensuite plus aucune relance n'est proposée.

attrs.value:
<dataquery id="even" table_name="{pj}_evt_data" varset_name="evt" table_alias="even" mode="rw">

	<column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="even" />
  	<column_simple field_name="evt_code" table_name="even" />
	<column_simple field_name="evt_libelle_long" table_name="even" />
	<column_simple field_name="evt_mdo" table_name="even" /> 
	<column_simple field_name="evt_fsd" table_name="even" />
	<column_simple field_name="evt_alerte" table_name="even" />
	<column_simple field_name="evt_inclus_surveillance" table_name="even" /> 

	<condition sql=" ( {s_code} IS NULL OR {even.evt_code} LIKE CONCAT('%',{s_code},'%') ) AND
						 ( {s_libelle} IS NULL OR {even.evt_libelle_long} LIKE CONCAT('%',{s_libelle},'%') OR {even.evt_libelle_court} LIKE CONCAT('%',{s_libelle},'%') ) AND
						 ( {s_famille} IS NULL OR {even.evt_famille} = {s_famille} )">
		<field field_name="evt_code" table_name="even" alias="even.evt_code" />
		<field field_name="evt_libelle_court" table_name="even" alias="even.evt_libelle_court" />
		<field field_name="evt_libelle_long" table_name="even" alias="even.evt_libelle_long" />
		<field field_name="evt_famille" table_name="even" alias="even.evt_famille" />

		<variable alias="s_code" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_code" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_code" row="current" />
		</variable>
		<variable alias="s_libelle" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_libelle" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_libelle" row="current" />
		</variable>
		<variable alias="s_famille" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_famille" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_famille" row="current" />
		</variable>
		
	</condition>
  
	<order_by sql="ORD({even.evt_code})">
   		<field field_name="evt_code" alias="even.evt_code" table_name="even"/>
	</order_by>
  	<order_by sql="LENGTH({even.evt_code})">
		<field field_name="evt_code" alias="even.evt_code" table_name="even"/>
	</order_by>
  	<order_by sql="{even.evt_code}">
		<field field_name="evt_code" alias="even.evt_code" table_name="even"/>
	</order_by>
	
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="cible" table_name="{pj}_cible_message_admin_data" varset_name="cible_message_admin" table_alias="cible_message_admin" begin="0" range="10">
	<!-- Listes des couples roles/groupes pour cibler les utilisateurs -->
	<column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="cible_message_admin" />
	<column_simple field_name="id_message_admin" table_name="cible_message_admin" />
	<column sql="{group.name}" alias="libelle_groupe" type="string">
      <field table_name="group" field_name="name" alias="group.name"/>
    </column>
    <column sql="{role.label}" alias="libelle_role" type="string">
      <field table_name="role" field_name="label" alias="role.label"/>
    </column>
  	<joins>
        <join detail_table="{pj}_pj_group" detail_alias="group" sql="{cible_message_admin.cma_id_groupe}={group.id_group}" type="inner" mode="r">
          <field table_name="cible_message_admin" field_name="cma_id_groupe" alias="cible_message_admin.cma_id_groupe"/>
          <field table_name="group" field_name="id_group" alias="group.id_group"/>
        </join>
        <join detail_table="{pj}_pj_role" detail_alias="role" sql="{cible_message_admin.cma_id_role}={role.id_role}" type="inner" mode="r">
          <field table_name="cible_message_admin" field_name="cma_id_role" alias="cible_message_admin.cma_id_role"/>
          <field table_name="role" field_name="id_role" alias="role.id_role"/>
        </join>
    </joins>
    <condition sql="{param_id_data}={fkey}">
        <variable alias="param_id_data" default="NULL">
          <entry type="param" name="id_message_admin"/>
          <entry type="dataset" name="message_admin" row="current" field="id_data"/>
        </variable>
        <field field_name="id_message_admin" table_name="cible_message_admin" alias="fkey"/>
      </condition>
	<order_by sql="{cible_message_admin.sys_creation_date} asc">
		<field field_name="sys_creation_date" alias="cible_message_admin.sys_creation_date" table_name="cible_message_admin"/>
	</order_by>
</dataquery>

<form_row>
	<button action="save" label="Save"/>  
</form_row>

<form_row>
	<button action="exit" label="Retour aux déclarations">
		<redirection module="declaration" ctrl="cases" action="get">
			<params>
				<value alias="id">82</value>
			</params>  
		</redirection>
	</button>

	<button action="save" label="Finaliser la fiche" class="btn-primary pull-right">
		<option output="html" option_name="show_on" value="({varset_fsd2.fsd_statut} == 'NF' || {varset_fsd2.fsd_statut} == 'AC') && ({user->roles}.indexOf('declarant') != -1 || {user->roles}.indexOf('superadmin') != -1)"/>
		<option output="html" option_name="additional_params" value="/set_fsd_statut/F"/>
		<redirection module="form" ctrl="decl" action="get">
			<params>
				<value alias="id">69</value>
				<dataset dataset_name="cas" field="cas_numero" alias="key"/>
			</params>
		</redirection>
	</button>

	<button action="save" label="Valider la fiche" class="btn-primary pull-right">
		<option output="html" option_name="show_on" value="{varset_fsd2.fsd_statut} == 'F' && ({user->roles}.indexOf('epidemio_cespa') != -1 || {user->roles}.indexOf('superadmin') != -1)"/>
		<option output="html" option_name="additional_params" value="/set_fsd_statut/V"/>
		<redirection module="form" ctrl="decl" action="get">
			<params>
				<value alias="id">69</value>
				<dataset dataset_name="cas" field="cas_numero" alias="key"/>
			</params>
		</redirection>
	</button>

	<button label="Demander une correction" action="modal" target="modal_fsd_correction" class="btn-modal btn-danger pull-right">
		<option output="html" option_name="show_on" value="{varset_fsd2.fsd_statut} == 'F' && ({user->roles}.indexOf('epidemio_cespa') != -1 || {user->roles}.indexOf('superadmin') != -1)" />
	</button>
</form_row>

<modal id="modal_fsd_correction">
	<modal_head title="Demander une correction du MEH"/>
	<modal_body>
		<form_row>
			<label dataset="fsd_correction" field="fsd_correction" class="col-xs-3 text-right"/>
			<value dataset="fsd_correction" field="fsd_correction" mode="rw" class="col-xs-9 text-left"/>
		</form_row>
	</modal_body>
	<modal_foot>
		<button label="Annuler" action="cancel_modal">
			<option output="html" option_name="close_modal" value="true"/>
		</button>
		<button label="Sauvegarder" action="save">
			<option output="html" option_name="close_modal" value="true"/>
			<option output="html" option_name="additional_params" value="set_fsd_statut/AC"/>
			<redirection module="form" ctrl="decl" action="get">
				<params>
					<value alias="id">69</value>
					<dataset dataset_name="cas" field="cas_numero" alias="key"/>
				</params>
			</redirection>
		</button>
	</modal_foot>
</modal>

<dataquery id="patient" table_name="{pj}_pat_data" varset_name="pat" table_alias="patient" mode="rw">

	<column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="patient" />
	<column_simple field_name="pat_code" table_name="patient" />
	<column_simple field_name="pat_prenom" table_name="patient" />
	<column_simple field_name="pat_nom_naissance" table_name="patient" />
	<column_simple field_name="pat_nom_usuel" table_name="patient" />
	<column_simple field_name="pat_sexe" table_name="patient" />
	<column_simple field_name="pat_ddn" table_name="patient" />
	
	<condition sql=" ( {s_code} IS NULL OR {patient.pat_code} LIKE CONCAT('%',{s_code},'%') ) AND
						 ( {s_prenom} IS NULL OR {patient.pat_prenom} LIKE CONCAT('%',{s_prenom},'%') ) AND
						 ( {s_nom} IS NULL OR {patient.pat_nom_naissance} LIKE CONCAT('%',{s_nom},'%') OR {patient.pat_nom_usuel} LIKE CONCAT('%',{s_nom},'%') ) AND
						 ( {s_sexe} IS NULL OR {patient.pat_sexe} = {s_sexe} ) AND
						 ( {s_ddn} IS NULL OR {patient.pat_ddn} = {s_ddn} )">
		<field field_name="pat_code" table_name="patient" alias="patient.pat_code" />
		<field field_name="pat_prenom" table_name="patient" alias="patient.pat_prenom" />
		<field field_name="pat_nom_usuel" table_name="patient" alias="patient.pat_nom_usuel" />
		<field field_name="pat_nom_naissance" table_name="patient" alias="patient.pat_nom_naissance" />
		<field field_name="pat_sexe" table_name="patient" alias="patient.pat_sexe" />
		<field field_name="pat_ddn" table_name="patient" alias="patient.pat_ddn" />

		<variable alias="s_code" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_code" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_code" row="current" />
		</variable>
		<variable alias="s_prenom" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_prenom" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_prenom" row="current" />
		</variable>
		<variable alias="s_nom" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_nom" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_nom" row="current" />
		</variable>
		<variable alias="s_sexe" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_sexe" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_sexe" row="current" />
		</variable>
		<variable alias="s_ddn" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_ddn" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_ddn" row="current" />
		</variable>
		
	</condition>
	
	<order_by sql="{patient.pat_nom_naissance} asc">
		<field field_name="pat_nom_naissance" alias="patient.pat_nom_naissance" table_name="patient"/>
	</order_by>
	
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="message" table_name="{pj}_message_admin_data" varset_name="message_admin" table_alias="message" mode="rw">

	<column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="message" />
	<column_simple field_name="sys_creation_date" table_name="message" />
	<column_simple field_name="mess_adm_titre" table_name="message" />
	<column_simple field_name="mess_adm_date_debut" table_name="message" />
	<column_simple field_name="mess_adm_date_fin" table_name="message" />
	<column_simple field_name="mess_adm_couleur" table_name="message" />

	<condition sql=" ( {s_date} IS NULL OR ( {message.mess_adm_date_debut} <= {s_date} AND {message.mess_adm_date_fin} >= {s_date} ) ) AND
						 ( {s_titre_contenu} IS NULL OR {message.mess_adm_titre} LIKE CONCAT('%',{s_titre_contenu},'%') OR {message.mess_adm_message} LIKE CONCAT('%',{s_titre_contenu},'%') ) AND
						 ( {s_couleur} IS NULL OR {message.mess_adm_couleur} = {s_couleur} )">
		<field field_name="mess_adm_titre" table_name="message" alias="message.mess_adm_titre" />
		<field field_name="mess_adm_message" table_name="message" alias="message.mess_adm_message" />
		<field field_name="mess_adm_date_debut" table_name="message" alias="message.mess_adm_date_debut" />
		<field field_name="mess_adm_date_fin" table_name="message" alias="message.mess_adm_date_fin" />
		<field field_name="mess_adm_couleur" table_name="message" alias="message.mess_adm_couleur" />

		<variable alias="s_titre_contenu" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_titre_contenu" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_titre_contenu" row="current" />
		</variable>
		<variable alias="s_date" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_date" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_date" row="current" />
		</variable>
		<variable alias="s_couleur" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_couleur" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_couleur" row="current" />
		</variable>

	</condition>

	<order_by sql="{message.sys_creation_date} desc">
		<field field_name="sys_creation_date" alias="message.sys_creation_date" table_name="message"/>
	</order_by>

</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataset
attrs.value:
<dataset id="search" mute_refresh_event="true">
	<metadata>
		<fields>
			<field id="s_groupe" type="integer" default_label="Périmètre" />
			<field id="s_evt" type="integer" default_label="Evènement de santé" />
			<field id="s_ncas" type="boolean" default_label="Inclure les non-cas" />
			<field id="s_date_decl_min" type="date" default_label="Date de déclaration supérieure à" />
			<field id="s_date_decl_max" type="date" default_label="Date de déclaration inférieure à" />
			<field id="s_annee" type="string" default_label="Année" >
				<string length="4"/>
			</field>
			<field id="s_semaine" type="string" default_label="Semaine" >
				<string length="2"/>
			</field>

			<field id="s_date_survenue_min" type="date" default_label="Date de survenue des signes inférieure à" /> <!-- fsd.fsd_date_survenue -->
			<field id="s_date_survenue_max" type="date" default_label="Date de survenue des signes inférieure à" />
			<field id="s_fsd_statut" type="fkey_dico" default_label="Statut" >
				<fkey_dico dico_name="statut_fsd" />
			</field>
			<field id="s_incoherence" type="boolean" default_label="Uniquement les fiches avec incohérences" />

			<field id="s_code_ano" type="string" default_label="Numéro d'anonymat" >
				<string length="16" />
			</field>
			<field id="s_nom" type="string" default_label="Nom">
				<string length="35" />
			</field>
			<field id="s_prenom" type="string" default_label="Prénom">
				<string length="35" />
			</field>

			<field id="s_age_min" type="string" default_label="Age à la déclaration supérieur à">
				<string length="2" />
			</field>
			<field id="s_age_max" type="string" default_label="Age à la déclaration supérieur à">
				<string length="2" />
			</field>
			<field id="s_sexe" type="fkey_dico" default_label="Sexe" >
				<fkey_dico dico_name="sexe" />
			</field>
			
		</fields>
	</metadata>
</dataset>

attrs.name: form.dataquery.main.joins
attrs.value:
<joins>
	<join detail_table="{pj}_struct_data" detail_alias="s" sql="{c.id_struct}={s.id_data}" type="inner" mode="r">
		<field table_name="bdc" field_name="id_struct" alias="c.id_struct"/>
		<field table_name="s" field_name="id_data" alias="s.id_data"/>
	</join>
	<join detail_table="{pj}_evt_data" detail_alias="e" sql="{c.id_evt}={e.id_data}" type="inner" mode="r">
		<field table_name="bdc" field_name="id_evt" alias="c.id_evt"/>
		<field table_name="e" field_name="id_data" alias="e.id_data"/>
	</join>
	<join detail_table="{pj}_fsd_data" detail_alias="fsd" sql="{f.id_cas}={c.id_data}" type="left" detail_varset_name="fsd" mode="r">
		<field table_name="fsd" field_name="id_cas" alias="f.id_cas"/>
		<field table_name="bdc" field_name="id_data" alias="c.id_data"/>
	</join>
	<join detail_table="{pj}_pat_data" detail_alias="p" sql="{c.id_pat}={p.id_data}" type="left" mode="r">
		<field table_name="bdc" field_name="id_pat" alias="c.id_pat"/>
		<field table_name="p" field_name="id_data" alias="p.id_data"/>
	</join>
	<join detail_table="{pj}_cas_data_group" detail_alias="g" sql="{g.id_data}={c.id_data}" type="inner" mode="r">
		<field table_name="g" field_name="id_data" alias="g.id_data"/>
		<field table_name="bdc" field_name="id_data" alias="c.id_data"/>
      
	</join>
</joins>

attrs.name: form.dataquery.main.condition
attrs.value:
<condition sql="( 
		{search_type} = 'num' AND ( {c.cas_numero} IS NULL OR {c.cas_numero} = {s_num} )
	)
	OR
	(
		{search_type} = 'multiple' AND
		( {s_groupe} IS NULL OR {g.id_group} = ({s_groupe} ) ) AND
		( {s_evt} IS NULL OR {s_evt} = {c.id_evt} ) AND
		/* CONDITION SUR LES NON-CAS */
		( {s_date_decl_min} IS NULL OR {s_date_decl_min} <= {c.cas_date} ) AND
		( {s_date_decl_max} IS NULL OR {s_date_decl_max} >= {c.cas_date} ) AND
		( {s_annee} IS NULL OR {s_annee} = DATE_FORMAT({c.cas_date}, '%x') ) AND
		( {s_semaine} IS NULL OR {s_semaine} = DATE_FORMAT({c.cas_date}, '%v') ) AND
		( {s_date_survenue_min} IS NULL OR {s_date_survenue_min} <= {f.fsd_date_survenue} ) AND
		( {s_date_survenue_max} IS NULL OR {s_date_survenue_max} >= {f.fsd_date_survenue} ) AND
		/* CONDITION LES INCOHERENCES */
		( {s_code_ano} IS NULL OR {s_code_ano} = {p.pat_code} ) AND
		( {s_nom} IS NULL OR {s_nom} = {p.pat_nom_naissance} OR {s_nom} = {p.pat_nom_usuel}  ) AND
		( {s_prenom} IS NULL OR {s_prenom} = {p.pat_prenom} ) AND
		( {s_age_min} IS NULL OR {c.cas_date} >= DATE_ADD( {p.pat_ddn}, INTERVAL +{s_age_min} YEAR ) ) AND
		( {s_age_max} IS NULL OR {c.cas_date} <= DATE_ADD( {p.pat_ddn}, INTERVAL +{s_age_max} YEAR ) ) AND
		( {s_sexe} IS NULL OR {s_sexe} = {p.pat_sexe} ) AND
		( {s_fsd_statut} IS NULL OR {s_fsd_statut} = {f.fsd_statut} )
	)">

	<field field_name="cas_numero" table_name="bdc" alias="c.cas_numero"/>
	<field field_name="id_evt" table_name="bdc" alias="c.id_evt"/>
	<field field_name="cas_date" table_name="bdc" alias="c.cas_date"/>

	<field field_name="fsd_date_survenue" table_name="fsd" alias="f.fsd_date_survenue"/>
	<field field_name="fsd_statut" table_name="fsd" alias="f.fsd_statut"/>

	<field field_name="pat_code" table_name="p" alias="p.pat_code"/>
	<field field_name="pat_nom_naissance" table_name="p" alias="p.pat_nom_naissance"/>
	<field field_name="pat_nom_usuel" table_name="p" alias="p.pat_nom_usuel"/>
	<field field_name="pat_prenom" table_name="p" alias="p.pat_prenom"/>
	<field field_name="pat_sexe" table_name="p" alias="p.pat_sexe"/>
	<field field_name="pat_ddn" table_name="p" alias="p.pat_ddn"/>

	<field field_name="id_group" table_name="g" alias="g.id_group"/>

	<variable alias="search_type" default="NULL">
		<entry type="param" name="search_type"/>
	</variable>
	<variable alias="s_num" default="null">
		<entry type="param" name="s_num"/>
		<entry type="dataset" name="search_num" field="s_num" row="current"/>
	</variable>
	<variable alias="s_groupe" default="null">
		<entry type="param" name="s_groupe"/>
		<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_groupe" row="current"/>
	</variable>
	<variable alias="s_evt" default="null">
		<entry type="param" name="s_evt"/>
		<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_evt" row="current"/>
	</variable>
	<variable alias="s_ncas" default="null">
		<entry type="param" name="s_ncas"/>
		<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_ncas" row="current"/>
	</variable>
	<variable alias="s_date_decl_min" default="null">
		<entry type="param" name="s_date_decl_min"/>
		<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_date_decl_min" row="current"/>
	</variable>
	<variable alias="s_date_decl_max" default="null">
		<entry type="param" name="s_date_decl_max"/>
		<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_date_decl_max" row="current"/>
	</variable>
	<variable alias="s_annee" default="null">
		<entry type="param" name="s_annee"/>
		<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_annee" row="current"/>
	</variable>
	<variable alias="s_semaine" default="null">
		<entry type="param" name="s_semaine"/>
		<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_semaine" row="current"/>
	</variable>
	<variable alias="s_date_survenue_min" default="null">
		<entry type="param" name="s_date_survenue_min"/>
		<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_date_survenue_min" row="current"/>
	</variable>
	<variable alias="s_date_survenue_max" default="null">
		<entry type="param" name="s_date_survenue_max"/>
		<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_date_survenue_max" row="current"/>
	</variable>
	<variable alias="s_fsd_statut" default="null">
		<entry type="param" name="s_fsd_statut"/>
		<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_fsd_statut" row="current"/>
	</variable>
	<variable alias="s_incoherence" default="null">
		<entry type="param" name="s_incoherence"/>
		<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_incoherence" row="current"/>
	</variable>
	<variable alias="s_code_ano" default="null">
		<entry type="param" name="s_code_ano"/>
		<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_code_ano" row="current"/>
	</variable>
	<variable alias="s_nom" default="null">
		<entry type="param" name="s_nom"/>
		<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_nom" row="current"/>
	</variable>
	<variable alias="s_prenom" default="null">
		<entry type="param" name="s_prenom"/>
		<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_prenom" row="current"/>
	</variable>
	<variable alias="s_age_min" default="null">
		<entry type="param" name="s_age_min"/>
		<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_age_min" row="current"/>
	</variable>
	<variable alias="s_age_max" default="null">
		<entry type="param" name="s_age_max"/>
		<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_age_max" row="current"/>
	</variable>
	<variable alias="s_sexe" default="null">
		<entry type="param" name="s_sexe"/>
		<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_sexe" row="current"/>
	</variable>
</condition>

<group title="Recherche par numéro de fiche">
	
    <form_row>

      <value dataset="search_num" field="s_num" mode="rw" class="col-md-8"/>

attrs.name: form.widget
attrs.value:
<group title="Recherche par critères multiples">
	<form_row>
		<label dataset="search" field="s_groupe" class="col-md-3"/>
      	<custom dataset="search" field="s_groupe" class="col-xs-4">
            <option output="html" option_name="widget" value="WidgetGroupTreeViewSelectOSEA"/>
            <option output="html" option_name="dataset" value="groups"/>
      	</custom>
		<label dataset="search" field="s_ncas" class="col-md-2"/>
		<value dataset="search" field="s_ncas" mode="rw" class="col-md-1"/>
	</form_row>

	<form_row>
		<label dataset="evt" field="label" class="col-sm-3">
			<option output="html" option_name="label" value="Evènement de santé" />
		</label>
		<value dataset="evt" field="label" class="col-sm-4 select-group" mode="r"/>

		<button label="Changer" action="modal" target="myModalEvent" class="btn-event btn-modal btn-primary" />
	</form_row>


	<form_row>
		<label dataset="search" field="s_date_decl_min" class="col-md-3"/>
		<value dataset="search" field="s_date_decl_min" mode="rw" class="col-md-8"/>
	</form_row>
	<form_row>
		<label dataset="search" field="s_date_decl_max" class="col-md-3"/>
		<value dataset="search" field="s_date_decl_max" mode="rw" class="col-md-8"/>
	</form_row>
	<form_row>
		<label dataset="search" field="s_annee" class="col-md-3"/>
		<value dataset="search" field="s_annee" mode="rw" class="col-md-2"/>
		<label dataset="search" field="s_semaine" class="col-md-2"/>
		<value dataset="search" field="s_semaine" mode="rw" class="col-md-2"/>
	</form_row>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="alert" editor_id="main" table_name="{pj}_alerte_data" varset_name="alerte" table_alias="a">
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="a"/>
  <column_simple field_name="alerte_sujet" table_name="a"/>
  
  <column sql="CONCAT({e.evt_code}, ' - ', {e.evt_libelle_court})" alias="event" type="string">
    <field table_name="e" field_name="evt_code" alias="e.evt_code"/>
    <field table_name="e" field_name="evt_libelle_court" alias="e.evt_libelle_court"/>
  </column>
  
  <column sql="CONCAT({s.str_code_cespa}, ' - ', {s.str_libelle_court})" alias="struct" type="string">
    <field table_name="s" field_name="str_code_cespa" alias="s.str_code_cespa"/>
    <field table_name="s" field_name="str_libelle_court" alias="s.str_libelle_court"/>
  </column>
  
  <column_simple field_name="alerte_type" table_name="a"/>
  <column_simple field_name="alerte_statut" table_name="a"/>
  <column_simple field_name="alerte_date_ouverture" table_name="a"/>
  <column_simple field_name="alerte_date_cloture" table_name="a"/>
  
  <column sql="CONCAT_WS( ' ', {code_grade}, {u.firstname}, {u.lastname})" alias="referent" type="string">
    <field table_name="d" field_name="code" alias="code_grade" mode="r"/>
    <field table_name="u" field_name="firstname" alias="u.firstname" mode="r"/>
    <field table_name="u" field_name="lastname" alias="u.lastname" mode="r"/>
  </column>
  
  <joins>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_evt_data" detail_alias="e" sql="{a.id_evt}={e.id_data}" type="left" detail_varset_name="evt" mode="rw">
      <field table_name="a" field_name="id_evt" alias="a.id_evt"/>
      <field table_name="e" field_name="id_data" alias="e.id_data"/>
    </join>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_struct_data" detail_alias="s" sql="{a.id_localisation_initiale}={s.id_data}" type="left" detail_varset_name="struct" mode="rw">
      <field table_name="a" field_name="id_localisation_initiale" alias="a.id_localisation_initiale"/>
      <field table_name="s" field_name="id_data" alias="s.id_data"/>
    </join>
    
    <join detail_table="{pj}_user_data" detail_alias="u" sql="{u.id_data}={a.id_personne_referente}">
      <field table_name="u" field_name="id_data" alias="u.id_data"/>
      <field table_name="a" field_name="id_personne_referente" alias="a.id_personne_referente"/>
    </join>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_dico_data" detail_alias="d" sql="{d.id_data}={u.grade_ssa}">
      <field table_name="d" field_name="id_data" alias="d.id_data"/>
      <field table_name="u" field_name="grade_ssa" alias="u.grade_ssa"/>
    </join>
  </joins>
  
  <condition sql="{_id_evt} = {a.id_evt}" optional="true">
    <field table_name="a" field_name="id_evt" alias="a.id_evt"/>
    <variable alias="_id_evt" default="NULL">
	  <entry type="param" name="id_evt"/>
	  <entry type="dataset" name="search" field="id_evt" row="current"/>
	</variable>
  </condition>
  
  <condition sql="{_alerte_date_ouverture_debut} <= {a.alerte_date_ouverture}" optional="true">
    <field table_name="a" field_name="alerte_date_ouverture" alias="a.alerte_date_ouverture"/>
    <variable alias="_alerte_date_ouverture_debut" default="NULL">
	  <entry type="param" name="alerte_date_ouverture_debut"/>
	  <entry type="dataset" name="search" field="alerte_date_ouverture_debut" row="current"/>
	</variable>
  </condition>
  
  <condition sql="{_alerte_date_ouverture_fin} >= {a.alerte_date_ouverture}" optional="true">
    <field table_name="a" field_name="alerte_date_ouverture" alias="a.alerte_date_ouverture"/>
    <variable alias="_alerte_date_ouverture_fin" default="NULL">
	  <entry type="param" name="alerte_date_ouverture_fin"/>
	  <entry type="dataset" name="search" field="alerte_date_ouverture_fin" row="current"/>
	</variable>
  </condition>
  
  <condition sql="{_id_evt} = {a.id_evt}" optional="true">
    <field table_name="a" field_name="id_evt" alias="a.id_evt"/>
    <variable alias="_id_evt" default="NULL">
	  <entry type="param" name="id_evt"/>
	  <entry type="dataset" name="search" field="id_evt" row="current"/>
	</variable>
  </condition>
  
  <condition sql="{_alerte_type} = {a.alerte_type}" optional="true">
    <field table_name="a" field_name="alerte_type" alias="a.alerte_type"/>
    <variable alias="_alerte_type" default="NULL">
	  <entry type="param" name="alerte_type"/>
	  <entry type="dataset" name="search" field="alerte_type" row="current"/>
	</variable>
  </condition>
  
  <condition sql="{_alerte_statut} = {a.alerte_statut}" optional="true">
    <field table_name="a" field_name="alerte_statut" alias="a.alerte_statut"/>
    <variable alias="_alerte_statut" default="NULL">
	  <entry type="param" name="alerte_statut"/>
	  <entry type="dataset" name="search" field="alerte_statut" row="current"/>
	</variable>
  </condition>
  
  <condition sql="{u.firstname} LIKE CONCAT('%',{_personne_referente},'%') OR {u.lastname} LIKE CONCAT('%',{_personne_referente},'%')" optional="true">
    <field table_name="u" field_name="firstname" alias="u.firstname"/>
    <field table_name="u" field_name="lastname" alias="u.lastname"/>
    <variable alias="_personne_referente" default="NULL">
	  <entry type="param" name="personne_referente"/>
	  <entry type="dataset" name="search" field="personne_referente" row="current"/>
	</variable>
  </condition>
  
</dataquery>

<dataquery id="unit" table_name="{pj}_unite_data" varset_name="unite" table_alias="unit" mode="rw">

	<column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="unit" />
  	<column_simple field_name="unite_code_credo" table_name="unit" />
	<column_simple field_name="unite_libelle_long" table_name="unit" />
	<column_simple field_name="unite_commune" table_name="unit" />
	<column_simple field_name="unite_cp" table_name="unit" />
  	<column_simple field_name="unite_pays" table_name="unit" />

	<condition sql=" ( {s_code} IS NULL OR {unit.unite_code_credo} LIKE CONCAT('%',{s_code},'%') ) AND
						 ( {s_libelle} IS NULL OR {unit.unite_libelle_long} LIKE CONCAT('%',{s_libelle},'%') OR {unit.unite_libelle_court} LIKE CONCAT('%',{s_libelle},'%') )">
		<field field_name="unite_code_credo" table_name="unit" alias="unit.unite_code_credo" />
		<field field_name="unite_libelle_court" table_name="unit" alias="unit.unite_libelle_court" />
		<field field_name="unite_libelle_long" table_name="unit" alias="unit.unite_libelle_long" />

		<variable alias="s_code" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_code" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_code" row="current" />
		</variable>
		<variable alias="s_libelle" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_libelle" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_libelle" row="current" />
		</variable>
		
	</condition>
  
	<order_by sql="{unit.unite_code_credo} asc">
		<field field_name="unite_code_credo" alias="unit.unite_code_credo" table_name="unit"/>
	</order_by>
	
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="doc_ref" table_name="{pj}_doc_reference_data" varset_name="doc_reference" table_alias="doc_ref" mode="rw">

	<column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="doc_ref" />
	<column_simple field_name="sys_creation_date" table_name="doc_ref" />
  	<column_simple field_name="doc_ref_titre" table_name="doc_ref" />
	<column_simple field_name="doc_ref_origine_org" table_name="doc_ref" />
	<column_simple field_name="doc_ref_type" table_name="doc_ref" />
	<column_simple field_name="doc_ref_obsolete" table_name="doc_ref" />

	<condition sql="( {s_titre} IS NULL OR {doc_ref.doc_ref_titre} LIKE CONCAT('%',{s_titre},'%') ) AND
						 ( {s_type} IS NULL OR {doc_ref.doc_ref_type} = {s_type} )">
		<field field_name="doc_ref_titre" table_name="doc_ref" alias="doc_ref.doc_ref_titre" />
		<field field_name="doc_ref_type" table_name="doc_ref" alias="doc_ref.doc_ref_type" />

		<variable alias="s_titre" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_titre" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_titre" row="current" />
		</variable>
		<variable alias="s_type" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_type" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_type" row="current" />
		</variable>
		
	</condition>
  
	<order_by sql="{doc_ref.sys_creation_date} asc">
		<field field_name="sys_creation_date" alias="doc_ref.sys_creation_date" table_name="doc_ref"/>
	</order_by>
	
</dataquery>

<dataquery id="label_event" table_name="{pj}_evt_data" varset_name="evt" table_alias="event">
	<column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="event"/>
	<column_simple field_name="evt_code" table_name="event"/>
  	<column_simple field_name="evt_famille" table_name="event"/>
	<column_simple field_name="evt_libelle_long" table_name="event"/>
  	<column sql="{event.evt_famille}" alias="family">
      <field table_name="event" field_name="evt_famille" alias="event.evt_famille"/>
	</column>
	<column sql="CONCAT({event.evt_code}, ' - ', {event.evt_libelle_court})" alias="label" type="string">
		<field table_name="event" field_name="evt_code" alias="event.evt_code"/>
		<field table_name="event" field_name="evt_libelle_court" alias="event.evt_libelle_court"/>
	</column>
	<order_by sql="{event.evt_code}">
		<field field_name="evt_code" alias="event.evt_code" table_name="event"/>
	</order_by>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="cas-0" table_name="{pj}_cas_data" varset_name="cas" table_alias="c">
	<!-- Semaine courante -->
	<column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="c"/>
	<column_simple field_name="cas_date" table_name="c"/>
	<column_simple field_name="evt_code" table_name="evt"/>
	<column_simple field_name="evt_libelle_long" table_name="evt"/>
  	<column_simple field_name="str_code_cespa" table_name="s"/>
	<column_simple field_name="str_code_cespa" table_name="s"/>
	<column_simple field_name="str_libelle_court" table_name="s"/>
	<column_simple field_name="cas_dans_effectif_temp" table_name="c"/>
	<column_simple field_name="cas_numero" table_name="c"/>
	<column_simple field_name="cas_circ_exp" table_name="c"/>
	<column_simple field_name="id_evt" table_name="c"/>
  	<column sql="IF({evt.evt_fsd} = 10, {c.cas_numero}, '')" alias="cas_numero_str" type="string">
		<field table_name="evt" field_name="evt_fsd" alias="evt.evt_fsd"/>
		<field table_name="c" field_name="cas_numero" alias="c.cas_numero"/>
	</column>
	<column sql="IF({c.cas_dans_effectif_temp} = 1, 'Oui', '')" alias="dans_effectif_temp_str" type="string">
		<field table_name="c" field_name="cas_dans_effectif_temp" alias="c.cas_dans_effectif_temp"/>
	</column>
	<column sql="CONCAT({event.evt_code}, ' - ', {event.evt_libelle_court})" alias="event" type="string">
		<field table_name="evt" field_name="evt_code" alias="event.evt_code"/>
		<field table_name="evt" field_name="evt_libelle_court" alias="event.evt_libelle_court"/>
	</column>
	<column sql="CONCAT({s.str_code_cespa}, ' - ', {s.str_libelle_court})" alias="struct" type="string">
		<field table_name="s" field_name="str_code_cespa" alias="s.str_code_cespa"/>
		<field table_name="s" field_name="str_libelle_court" alias="s.str_libelle_court"/>
	</column>
	<column sql="CONCAT({s.str_code_cespa}, ' ', {s.str_libelle_long})" alias="struct_filter" type="string">
		<field table_name="s" field_name="str_code_cespa" alias="s.str_code_cespa"/>
		<field table_name="s" field_name="str_libelle_long" alias="s.str_libelle_long"/>
	</column>
  	<column sql="{s.id_data}" alias="id_struct_filter" type="string">
		<field table_name="s" field_name="id_data" alias="s.id_data"/>
	</column>
	<joins>
		<join detail_table="{pj}_evt_data" detail_alias="evt" sql="{c.id_evt}={evt.id_data}" mode="rw">
			<field table_name="c" field_name="id_evt" alias="c.id_evt"/>
			<field table_name="evt" field_name="id_data" alias="evt.id_data"/>
		</join>
		<join detail_table="{pj}_struct_data" detail_alias="s" sql="{c.id_struct}={s.id_data}" mode="rw">
			<field table_name="c" field_name="id_struct" alias="c.id_struct"/>
			<field table_name="s" field_name="id_data" alias="s.id_data"/>
		</join>
	</joins>
	<condition sql="1=1">
		<variable alias="case_date" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="case_date"/>
			<entry type="dataset" name="decl" field="case_date" row="current"/>
		</variable>
		<variable alias="event" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="event"/>
			<entry type="dataset" name="decl" field="event" row="current"/>
		</variable>
		<variable alias="nb_cas_eff_perm" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="nb_cas_eff_perm"/>
			<entry type="dataset" name="decl" field="nb_cas_eff_perm" row="current"/>
		</variable>
		<variable alias="nb_cas_eff_temp" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="nb_cas_eff_temp"/>
			<entry type="dataset" name="decl" field="nb_cas_eff_temp" row="current"/>
		</variable>
		<variable alias="cas_circ_exp" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="cas_circ_exp"/>
			<entry type="dataset" name="decl" field="circ_exp" row="current"/>
		</variable>
	</condition>
	<!-- Semaine courante -->
	<condition sql="{c.cas_date} >= DATE_ADD( CURDATE(), INTERVAL( 2 - DAYOFWEEK( CURDATE() ) ) DAY ) AND        {c.cas_date} <= DATE_ADD( CURDATE(), INTERVAL( 8 - DAYOFWEEK( CURDATE() ) ) DAY )">
		<field field_name="cas_date" alias="c.cas_date" table_name="c"/>
	</condition>
	<order_by sql="{c.cas_date} DESC">
		<field field_name="cas_date" alias="c.cas_date" table_name="c"/>
	</order_by>
  	<order_by sql="{c.sys_creation_date} DESC">
		<field field_name="sys_creation_date" alias="c.sys_creation_date" table_name="c"/>
	</order_by>
  	<group_by sql="{c.id_data}">
      <field field_name="id_data" alias="c.id_data" table_name="c"/>
    </group_by>
</dataquery>

		<field table_name="evt" field_name="evt_code" alias="event.evt_code"/>
		<field table_name="evt" field_name="evt_libelle_court" alias="event.evt_libelle_court"/>
	</column>
	<column sql="CONCAT({s.str_code_cespa}, ' - ', {s.str_libelle_court})" alias="struct" type="string">
		<field table_name="s" field_name="str_code_cespa" alias="s.str_code_cespa"/>
		<field table_name="s" field_name="str_libelle_court" alias="s.str_libelle_court"/>
	</column>
	<column sql="CONCAT({s.str_code_cespa}, ' ', {s.str_libelle_long})" alias="struct_filter" type="string">
		<field table_name="s" field_name="str_code_cespa" alias="s.str_code_cespa"/>
		<field table_name="s" field_name="str_libelle_long" alias="s.str_libelle_long"/>
	</column>
  	<column sql="{s.id_data}" alias="id_struct_filter" type="string">
		<field table_name="s" field_name="id_data" alias="s.id_data"/>
	</column>
	<joins>
		<join detail_table="{pj}_evt_data" detail_alias="evt" sql="{c.id_evt}={evt.id_data}" mode="rw">
			<field table_name="c" field_name="id_evt" alias="c.id_evt"/>
			<field table_name="evt" field_name="id_data" alias="evt.id_data"/>
		</join>
		<join detail_table="{pj}_struct_data" detail_alias="s" sql="{c.id_struct}={s.id_data}" mode="rw">
			<field table_name="c" field_name="id_struct" alias="c.id_struct"/>
			<field table_name="s" field_name="id_data" alias="s.id_data"/>
		</join>
	</joins>
	<condition sql="1=1">
		<variable alias="case_date" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="case_date"/>
			<entry type="dataset" name="decl" field="case_date" row="current"/>
		</variable>
		<variable alias="event" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="event"/>
			<entry type="dataset" name="decl" field="event" row="current"/>
		</variable>
		<variable alias="nb_cas_eff_perm" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="nb_cas_eff_perm"/>
			<entry type="dataset" name="decl" field="nb_cas_eff_perm" row="current"/>
		</variable>
		<variable alias="nb_cas_eff_temp" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="nb_cas_eff_temp"/>
			<entry type="dataset" name="decl" field="nb_cas_eff_temp" row="current"/>
		</variable>
		<variable alias="cas_circ_exp" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="cas_circ_exp"/>
			<entry type="dataset" name="decl" field="circ_exp" row="current"/>
		</variable>
	</condition>
	<!-- Semaine courante-3 -->
	<condition sql="{c.cas_date} >= DATE_ADD( CURDATE(), INTERVAL( -19 - DAYOFWEEK( CURDATE() ) ) DAY ) AND        {c.cas_date} <= DATE_ADD( CURDATE(), INTERVAL( -13 - DAYOFWEEK( CURDATE() ) ) DAY )">
		<field field_name="cas_date" alias="c.cas_date" table_name="c"/>
	</condition>
	<order_by sql="{c.cas_date} DESC">
		<field field_name="cas_date" alias="c.cas_date" table_name="c"/>
	</order_by>
  	<order_by sql="{c.sys_creation_date} DESC">
		<field field_name="sys_creation_date" alias="c.sys_creation_date" table_name="c"/>
	</order_by>
  	<group_by sql="{c.id_data}">
      <field field_name="id_data" alias="c.id_data" table_name="c"/>
    </group_by>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery

<dataquery id="evt" table_name="{pj}_evt_data" varset_name="evt" table_alias="e" editor_id="rsylbrdbib1458053870250">
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="e"/>
  <column_simple field_name="evt_criteres" table_name="e"/>
  <column_simple field_name="evt_mdo" table_name="e"/>
  <column_simple field_name="evt_fsd" table_name="e"/>
  <column_simple field_name="evt_alerte" table_name="e"/>
  <column_simple field_name="evt_code" table_name="e"/>
  <column_simple field_name="evt_libelle_court" table_name="e"/>
  <column sql="CONCAT_WS(' | ', IF( {e.evt_mdo} = 10,'MDO', NULL ), IF( {e.evt_fsd} = 10,'Donne lieu à la rédaction d’une fiche', NULL ), IF( {e.evt_alerte} = 10,'Déclenche une alerte', NULL ) )" alias="evt_info" type="string">
    <field table_name="e" field_name="evt_mdo" alias="e.evt_mdo"/>
    <field table_name="e" field_name="evt_fsd" alias="e.evt_fsd"/>
    <field table_name="e" field_name="evt_alerte" alias="e.evt_alerte"/>
  </column>
  <column sql="CONCAT({e.evt_code}, ' - ', {e.evt_libelle_court})" alias="label" type="string">
    <field table_name="e" field_name="evt_code" alias="e.evt_code"/>
    <field table_name="e" field_name="evt_libelle_court" alias="e.evt_libelle_court"/>
  </column>
  <condition sql="( {search_code} IS NOT NULL AND {e.id_data} = {search_code} )">
    <field field_name="id_data" table_name="e" alias="e.id_data"/>
    <variable alias="search_code" default="NULL">
      <entry type="param" name="search_code"/>
      <entry type="dataset" name="decl" field="event" row="current"/>
    </variable>
  </condition>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="meh" table_name="{pj}_meh_data" table_alias="meh" varset_name="meh">
	<column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="meh" />
    <column_simple field_name="meh_num" table_name="meh" />
    <column_simple field_name="meh_statut" table_name="meh" />
    <column sql="CONCAT('Semaine ', {meh.meh_semaine}, ' - ', {meh.meh_annee}, ' du ', DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT({meh.meh_annee}, {meh.meh_semaine}, ' Monday'), '%x%v %W'), '%d/%m%/%Y'), ' au ', DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT({meh.meh_annee}, {meh.meh_semaine}, ' Sunday'), '%x%v %W'), '%d/%m%/%Y') )" alias="meh_date_display" type="string">
        <field table_name="meh" field_name="meh_annee" alias="meh.meh_annee"/>
        <field table_name="meh" field_name="meh_semaine" alias="meh.meh_semaine"/>
    </column>
  	<column sql="CONCAT_WS( ' - ', {str.str_code_cespa}, {str.str_libelle_long} )" alias="meh_structure" type="string">
        <field table_name="str" field_name="str_code_cespa" alias="str.str_code_cespa"/>
        <field table_name="str" field_name="str_libelle_long" alias="str.str_libelle_long"/>
    </column>
  	
  	<column sql="IF( {str.str_tel} IS NOT NULL, CONCAT( {str.str_code_cespa}, ' - ', {str.str_libelle_court}, ' : ', {str.str_tel} ), '' )" alias="tels_str" type="string">
      <field table_name="str" field_name="str_tel" alias="str.str_tel"/>
      <field table_name="str" field_name="str_code_cespa" alias="str.str_code_cespa"/>
      <field table_name="str" field_name="str_libelle_court" alias="str.str_libelle_court"/>
    </column>
  
  	<column_simple field_name="meh_correction" table_name="meh"/>
  	<column sql="{str.str_id_group}" alias="str_id_group" type="string">
        <field table_name="str" field_name="str_id_group" alias="str.str_id_group"/>
    </column>
  	
  	<join detail_table="{pj}_struct_data" detail_alias="str" sql="{str.id_data}={meh.id_struct}" type="inner" mode="r">
        <field table_name="str" field_name="id_data" alias="str.id_data"/>
        <field table_name="meh" field_name="id_struct" alias="meh.id_struct"/>
    </join>
  
  	<condition sql="{id_data}={param_id_data}">
        <field field_name="id_data" table_name="meh" alias="id_data"/>
        <variable alias="param_id_data" default="NULL">
          <entry type="param" name="id_meh"/>
        </variable>
    </condition>
  	
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="fsd" table_name="{pj}_fsd_data" table_alias="fsd" varset_name="fsd">
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="fsd" />
  <column_simple field_name="fsd_correction" table_name="fsd"/>
  <column_simple field_name="fsd_statut" table_name="fsd"/>
  <column_simple field_name="fsd_declarant" table_name="fsd"/>
  <column sql="IF( {fsd.fsd_statut} = 241, concat_ws( ' ', {dou.label}, {ou.firstname}, {ou.lastname} ), concat_ws( ' ', {du.label}, {u.firstname}, {u.lastname} ) )" alias="declarant" type="string">
    <field table_name="fsd" field_name="fsd_statut" alias="fsd.fsd_statut"/>
    <field table_name="dou" field_name="label" alias="dou.label"/>
    <field table_name="ou" field_name="firstname" alias="ou.firstname"/>
    <field table_name="ou" field_name="lastname" alias="ou.lastname"/>
    <field table_name="du" field_name="label" alias="du.label"/>
    <field table_name="u" field_name="firstname" alias="u.firstname"/>
    <field table_name="u" field_name="lastname" alias="u.lastname"/>
  </column>
  
  <column sql="IF( {fsd.fsd_statut} = 241, {fsd.id_owner}, {fsd.fsd_declarant} )" alias="id_declarant" type="string">
    <field table_name="fsd" field_name="fsd_statut" alias="fsd.fsd_statut"/>
    <field table_name="fsd" field_name="fsd_declarant" alias="fsd.fsd_declarant"/>
    <field table_name="fsd" field_name="id_owner" alias="fsd.id_owner"/>
  </column>
  
  <column_simple field_name="id_cas" table_name="fsd"/>
  
  <column_simple field_name="cas_numero" table_name="cas"/>
  <column_simple field_name="cas_date" table_name="cas"/>
  <column_simple field_name="cas_circ_exp" table_name="cas"/>
  <column_simple field_name="id_struct" table_name="cas"/>
  
  <column sql="CONCAT({str.str_code_cespa}, ' - ', {str.str_libelle_court})" alias="struct" type="string">
    <field table_name="str" field_name="str_code_cespa" alias="str.str_code_cespa"/>
    <field table_name="str" field_name="str_libelle_court" alias="str.str_libelle_court"/>
  </column>
  
  <column sql="IF( {str.str_tel} IS NOT NULL, CONCAT( {str.str_code_cespa}, ' - ', {str.str_libelle_court}, ' : ', {str.str_tel} ), '' )" alias="tels_str" type="string">
    <field table_name="str" field_name="str_tel" alias="str.str_tel"/>
    <field table_name="str" field_name="str_code_cespa" alias="str.str_code_cespa"/>
    <field table_name="str" field_name="str_libelle_court" alias="str.str_libelle_court"/>
  </column>
  
  <joins>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_cas_data" detail_alias="cas" sql="{fsd.id_cas} = {cas.id_data}" mode="r" detail_varset_name="cas">
      <field table_name="fsd" field_name="id_cas" alias="fsd.id_cas"/>
      <field table_name="cas" field_name="id_data" alias="cas.id_data"/>
    </join>
    
    <join detail_table="{pj}_struct_data" detail_alias="str" sql="{cas.id_struct}={str.id_data}" mode="r" detail_varset_name="struct">
      <field table_name="cas" field_name="id_struct" alias="cas.id_struct"/>
      <field table_name="str" field_name="id_data" alias="str.id_data"/>
    </join>
    
    <join detail_table="{pj}_user_data" detail_alias="ou" sql="{fsd.id_owner} = {ou.id_group}" type="left" mode="r">
      <field table_name="fsd" field_name="id_owner" alias="fsd.id_owner"/>
      <field table_name="ou" field_name="id_group" alias="ou.id_group"/>
    </join>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_user_data" detail_alias="u" sql="{fsd.fsd_declarant} = {u.id_group}" type="left" mode="r">
      <field table_name="fsd" field_name="fsd_declarant" alias="fsd.fsd_declarant"/>
      <field table_name="u" field_name="id_group" alias="u.id_group"/>
    </join>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_dico_data" detail_alias="du" sql="{du.id_data} = {u.grade_ssa}" type="left" mode="r">
      <field table_name="du" field_name="id_data" alias="du.id_data"/>
      <field table_name="u" field_name="grade_ssa" alias="u.grade_ssa"/>
    </join>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_dico_data" detail_alias="dou" sql="{dou.id_data} = {ou.grade_ssa}" type="left" mode="r">
      <field table_name="dou" field_name="id_data" alias="dou.id_data"/>
      <field table_name="ou" field_name="grade_ssa" alias="ou.grade_ssa"/>
    </join>
  </joins>
  
  <condition sql="{id_data}={param_id_data}">
    <field field_name="id_data" table_name="fsd" alias="id_data"/>
    <variable alias="param_id_data" default="NULL">
      <entry type="param" name="id_fsd"/>
    </variable>
  </condition>
  	
</dataquery>

<dataquery id="mails_meh" table_name="{pj}_user_data" table_alias="u" varset_name="user">

	</column>
	
	<join detail_table="{pj}_pj_group_link" detail_alias="gl" sql="{u.id_group} = {gl.id_group}" type="inner" mode="r">
		<field table_name="u" field_name="id_group" alias="u.id_group"/>
		<field table_name="gl" field_name="id_group" alias="gl.id_group"/>

	<join detail_table="{pj}_pj_group" detail_alias="g" sql="{gl.id_group_parent} = {g.id_group}" type="inner" mode="r">
		<field table_name="gl" field_name="id_group_parent" alias="gl.id_group_parent"/>
		<field table_name="g" field_name="id_group" alias="g.id_group"/>

		</variable>
	</condition>
	
</dataquery>

															 CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT({c.cas_date}, '%x'), DATE_FORMAT({c.cas_date}, '%v')) = CONCAT({m.meh_annee}, {m.meh_semaine})" type="inner" detail_varset_name="meh" mode="r">
		<field table_name="m" field_name="id_data" alias="m.id_data"/>
		<field table_name="m" field_name="id_struct" alias="m.id_struct"/>
		<field table_name="m" field_name="meh_annee" alias="m.meh_annee"/>
		<field table_name="m" field_name="meh_semaine" alias="m.meh_semaine"/>
		<field table_name="cac" field_name="id_struct" alias="c.id_struct"/>
		<field table_name="cac" field_name="cas_date" alias="c.cas_date"/>
	</join>
	<join detail_table="{pj}_struct_data" detail_alias="s" sql="{c.id_struct}={s.id_data}" type="inner" detail_varset_name="struct" mode="r">
		<field table_name="cac" field_name="id_struct" alias="c.id_struct"/>
		<field table_name="s" field_name="id_data" alias="s.id_data"/>
	</join>
	<join detail_table="{pj}_evt_data" detail_alias="e" sql="{c.id_evt}={e.id_data}" type="inner" detail_varset_name="evt" mode="r">
		<field table_name="cac" field_name="id_evt" alias="c.id_evt"/>
		<field table_name="e" field_name="id_data" alias="e.id_data"/>
	</join>
	<join detail_table="{pj}_fsd_data" detail_alias="fsd" sql="{f.id_cas}={c.id_data}" type="left" detail_varset_name="fsd" mode="r">
		<field table_name="fsd" field_name="id_cas" alias="f.id_cas"/>
		<field table_name="cac" field_name="id_data" alias="c.id_data"/>
	</join>
</joins>
