attrs.name: form.widget
form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="meh_non_recu" table_name="{pj}_meh_data" table_alias="meh" varset_name="meh">
	<column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="meh" />
	<column_simple field_name="meh_num" table_name="meh" />
	<column_simple field_name="meh_annee" table_name="meh" />
	<column_simple field_name="meh_semaine" table_name="meh" />

	<column sql="CONCAT( {struct.str_code_cespa}, ' - ', {struct.str_libelle_long} )" alias="struct_str" type="string">
		<field table_name="struct" field_name="str_code_cespa" alias="struct.str_code_cespa"/>
		<field table_name="struct" field_name="str_libelle_long" alias="struct.str_libelle_long"/>
	</column>
  
  	<!-- 401 = "Téléphone"
		 Les MEH non reçu ont toujours une communication de type "Téléphone"      
		en pratique c'est incalculable, car aucune, une ou plusieurs réponses sont possibles !!!!!!!!!
	-->
  	<column sql="'401'" alias="rel_moyen_comm" type="fkey_dico" dico_name="moyen_communication">
      <field table_name="struct" field_name="str_libelle_long" alias="dummy"/>
	</column>

	<join detail_table="{pj}_struct_data" detail_alias="struct" sql="{struct.id_data}={meh.id_struct}" type="inner" detail_varset_name="struct" mode="rw">
		<field table_name="struct" field_name="id_data" alias="struct.id_data"/>
		<field table_name="meh" field_name="id_struct" alias="meh.id_struct"/>
	</join>
  
    <!-- 403 = Relance MEH non reçu -->
  	<join detail_table="{pj}_relance_data" detail_alias="relance" sql="{relance.id_meh}={meh.id_data} AND {relance.rel_sujet} = 403" type="left" detail_varset_name="relance" mode="rw">
		<field table_name="relance" field_name="id_meh" alias="relance.id_meh"/>
        <field table_name="relance" field_name="rel_sujet" alias="relance.rel_sujet"/>
		<field table_name="meh" field_name="id_data" alias="meh.id_data"/>
	</join>

  	<!-- 382 = Non déclaré-->
	<condition sql="{meh.meh_statut}=382">
		<field field_name="meh_statut" alias="meh.meh_statut" table_name="meh"/>
	</condition>
  
    <!-- dans la semaine suivant le MEH -->
 	<condition sql="STR_TO_DATE( concat( {meh.meh_annee}, {meh.meh_semaine}, ' Sunday'), '%x%v %W') < ( CURDATE() - INTERVAL {x3} DAY )">
		<field field_name="meh_annee" alias="meh.meh_annee" table_name="meh"/>
		<field field_name="meh_semaine" alias="meh.meh_semaine" table_name="meh"/>
        <variable alias="x3" default="null">
			<entry type="param" name="param_relance_meh_nb_jour_1ere_relance" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="param_relance" row="current" field="param_relance_meh_nb_jour_1ere_relance" />
		</variable>
	</condition>

    <!-- une ligne par MEH -->
    <group_by sql="{meh.id_data}">
      <field field_name="id_data" table_name="meh" alias="meh.id_data" />
    </group_by>
  
    <!-- * si pas encore de relance 
 		 * si a une relance après j-{z3} ET pas de relance après j-{y3} --> 
    <having sql="(COUNT({relance.id_data}) = 0) OR 
         ( ( MIN({relance.relance_date_realisation}) >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL {z3} DAY ) AND ( MAX({relance.relance_date_realisation}) <= CURDATE() - INTERVAL {y3} DAY ) )">
      <field field_name="id_data" table_name="relance" alias="relance.id_data" />
      <field field_name="relance_date_realisation" table_name="relance" alias="relance.relance_date_realisation" />
      <variable alias="y3" default="null">
        <entry type="param" name="param_relance_meh_non_recu_delai" />
        <entry type="dataset" name="param_relance" row="current" field="param_relance_meh_non_recu_delai" />
	  </variable>
      <variable alias="z3" default="null">
        <entry type="param" name="param_relance_meh_nb_jour_relances" />
        <entry type="dataset" name="param_relance" row="current" field="param_relance_meh_nb_jour_relances" />
	  </variable>
 	</having>

</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="meh_a_corriger" table_name="{pj}_meh_data" table_alias="meh" varset_name="meh">
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="meh" />
  <column_simple field_name="meh_num" table_name="meh" />
  <column_simple field_name="meh_annee" table_name="meh" />
  <column_simple field_name="meh_semaine" table_name="meh" />
  
  <column sql="CONCAT( {struct.str_code_cespa}, ' - ', {struct.str_libelle_long} )" alias="struct_str" type="string">
    <field table_name="struct" field_name="str_code_cespa" alias="struct.str_code_cespa"/>
    <field table_name="struct" field_name="str_libelle_long" alias="struct.str_libelle_long"/>
  </column>
  
  <column sql="'401'" alias="rel_moyen_comm" type="fkey_dico" dico_name="moyen_communication">
    <field table_name="struct" field_name="str_libelle_long" alias="dummy"/>
  </column>
  
  <join detail_table="{pj}_struct_data" detail_alias="struct" sql="{struct.id_data}={meh.id_struct}" type="inner" detail_varset_name="struct" mode="rw">
    <field table_name="struct" field_name="id_data" alias="struct.id_data"/>
    <field table_name="meh" field_name="id_struct" alias="meh.id_struct"/>
  </join>
  
  <!-- 404 = Relance MEH à corriger -->
  <join detail_table="{pj}_relance_data" detail_alias="relance" sql="{relance.id_meh}={meh.id_data} AND {relance.rel_sujet} = 404" type="left" detail_varset_name="relance" mode="rw">
    <field table_name="relance" field_name="id_meh" alias="relance.id_meh"/>
    <field table_name="relance" field_name="rel_sujet" alias="relance.rel_sujet"/>
    <field table_name="meh" field_name="id_data" alias="meh.id_data"/>
  </join>

  <!-- 384 = A corrigé-->
  <condition sql="{meh.meh_statut}=384">
    <field field_name="meh_statut" alias="meh.meh_statut" table_name="meh"/>
  </condition>
  
  <!-- une ligne par MEH -->
  <group_by sql="{meh.id_data}">
    <field field_name="id_data" table_name="meh" alias="meh.id_data"/>
  </group_by>
  
  <!--  * si pas encore de relance 
		* si la dernière relance à j-{y4} -->
  <having sql="(COUNT({relance.id_data}) = 0) OR (MAX({relance.relance_date_realisation}) < CURDATE() - INTERVAL {y4} DAY)">
    <field field_name="id_data" table_name="relance" alias="relance.id_data"/>
    <field field_name="relance_date_realisation" table_name="relance" alias="relance.relance_date_realisation"/>
    <variable alias="y4" default="null">
      <entry type="param" name="param_relance_meh_a_corrige_delai"/>
      <entry type="dataset" name="param_relance" row="current" field="param_relance_meh_a_corrige_delai"/>
    </variable>
  </having>
  
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="fsd_non_recue" table_name="{pj}_fsd_data" table_alias="fsd" varset_name="fsd">
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="fsd" />
  <column_simple field_name="cas_date" table_name="cas" />
  <column sql="CONCAT( {struct.str_code_cespa}, ' - ', {struct.str_libelle_long} )" alias="struct_str" type="string">
    <field table_name="struct" field_name="str_code_cespa" alias="struct.str_code_cespa"/>
    <field table_name="struct" field_name="str_libelle_long" alias="struct.str_libelle_long"/>
  </column>  
  <column sql="CONCAT( {evt.evt_code}, ' - ', {evt.evt_libelle_long} )" alias="evt_str" type="string">
    <field table_name="evt" field_name="evt_code" alias="evt.evt_code"/>
    <field table_name="evt" field_name="evt_libelle_long" alias="evt.evt_libelle_long"/>
  </column>
  <column_simple field_name="cas_numero" table_name="cas" />  
  <column sql="{cas.cas_numero}" alias="cas_numero_str" type="string">
    <field table_name="cas" field_name="cas_numero" alias="cas.cas_numero"/>
  </column>
  
  <column sql="CASE WHEN COUNT({relance.id_data}) > {z1} THEN '401' ELSE '402' END" alias="rel_moyen_comm" type="fkey_dico" dico_name="moyen_communication">
    <field table_name="relance" field_name="id_data" alias="relance.id_data"/>
    <variable alias="z1" default="null">
      <entry type="param" name="param_relance_fsd_nb_jour_relances_mail"/>
      <entry type="dataset" name="param_relance" row="current" field="param_relance_fsd_nb_jour_relances_mail"/>
    </variable>
  </column>
  
  <join detail_table="{pj}_cas_data" detail_alias="cas" sql="{cas.id_data}={fsd.id_cas}" type="inner" detail_varset_name="cas" mode="rw">
    <field table_name="cas" field_name="id_data" alias="cas.id_data"/>
    <field table_name="fsd" field_name="id_cas" alias="fsd.id_cas"/>
  </join>
  
  <join detail_table="{pj}_struct_data" detail_alias="struct" sql="{struct.id_data}={cas.id_struct}" type="inner" detail_varset_name="struct" mode="rw">
    <field table_name="struct" field_name="id_data" alias="struct.id_data"/>
    <field table_name="cas" field_name="id_struct" alias="cas.id_struct"/>
  </join>
  
  <join detail_table="{pj}_evt_data" detail_alias="evt" sql="{evt.id_data}={cas.id_evt}" type="inner" detail_varset_name="evt" mode="rw">
    <field table_name="evt" field_name="id_data" alias="evt.id_data"/>
    <field table_name="cas" field_name="id_evt" alias="cas.id_evt"/>
  </join>
  
  <!-- 405 = Relance FSD non reçue -->
  <join detail_table="{pj}_relance_data" detail_alias="relance" sql="{relance.id_fsd}={fsd.id_data} AND {relance.rel_sujet} = 405" type="left" detail_varset_name="relance" mode="rw">
    <field table_name="relance" field_name="id_fsd" alias="relance.id_fsd"/>
    <field table_name="relance" field_name="rel_sujet" alias="relance.rel_sujet"/>
    <field table_name="fsd" field_name="id_data" alias="fsd.id_data"/>
  </join>
  
  <!-- 241 = Non finalisée-->
  <condition sql="{fsd.fsd_statut}=241">
    <field field_name="fsd_statut" alias="fsd.fsd_statut" table_name="fsd"/>
  </condition>
  
  <!-- cas_date avant j-{x1} -->
  <condition sql="{cas.cas_date} < ( CURDATE() - INTERVAL {x1} DAY )">
    <field field_name="cas_date" alias="cas.cas_date" table_name="cas"/>
    <variable alias="x1" default="null">
      <entry type="param" name="param_relance_fsd_nb_jour_1ere_relance"/>
      <entry type="dataset" name="param_relance" row="current" field="param_relance_fsd_nb_jour_1ere_relance"/>
    </variable>
  </condition>
  
  <!-- 1 ligne par FSD -->
  <group_by sql="{fsd.id_data}">
    <field field_name="id_data" table_name="fsd" alias="fsd.id_data"/>
  </group_by>
  
  <!-- * si pas encore de relance 
    * si pas de relance après j-{y1} -->
  <having sql="(COUNT({relance.id_data}) = 0) OR (MAX({relance.relance_date_realisation}) <= CURDATE() - INTERVAL {y1} DAY)">
    <field field_name="id_data" table_name="relance" alias="relance.id_data"/>
    <field field_name="relance_date_realisation" table_name="relance" alias="relance.relance_date_realisation"/>
    <variable alias="y1" default="null">
      <entry type="param" name="param_relance_fsd_non_recue_delai"/>
      <entry type="dataset" name="param_relance" row="current" field="param_relance_fsd_non_recue_delai"/>
    </variable>
  </having>
  
  
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="fsd_a_corriger" table_name="{pj}_fsd_data" table_alias="fsd" varset_name="fsd">
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="fsd" />
  <column_simple field_name="cas_date" table_name="cas" />
  
  <column sql="CONCAT( {struct.str_code_cespa}, ' - ', {struct.str_libelle_long} )" alias="struct_str" type="string">
    <field table_name="struct" field_name="str_code_cespa" alias="struct.str_code_cespa"/>
    <field table_name="struct" field_name="str_libelle_long" alias="struct.str_libelle_long"/>
  </column>  
  
  <column sql="CONCAT( {evt.evt_code}, ' - ', {evt.evt_libelle_long} )" alias="evt_str" type="string">
    <field table_name="evt" field_name="evt_code" alias="evt.evt_code"/>
    <field table_name="evt" field_name="evt_libelle_long" alias="evt.evt_libelle_long"/>
  </column>
  <column_simple field_name="cas_numero" table_name="cas" />
  <column sql="{cas.cas_numero}" alias="cas_numero_str" type="string">
    <field table_name="cas" field_name="cas_numero" alias="cas.cas_numero"/>
  </column>
  
  <column sql="'402'" alias="rel_moyen_comm" type="fkey_dico" dico_name="moyen_communication">
    <field table_name="struct" field_name="str_libelle_long" alias="dummy"/>
  </column>
  
  <join detail_table="{pj}_cas_data" detail_alias="cas" sql="{cas.id_data}={fsd.id_cas}" type="inner" detail_varset_name="cas" mode="rw">
    <field table_name="cas" field_name="id_data" alias="cas.id_data"/>
    <field table_name="fsd" field_name="id_cas" alias="fsd.id_cas"/>
  </join>
  
  <join detail_table="{pj}_struct_data" detail_alias="struct" sql="{struct.id_data}={cas.id_struct}" type="inner" detail_varset_name="struct" mode="rw">
    <field table_name="struct" field_name="id_data" alias="struct.id_data"/>
    <field table_name="cas" field_name="id_struct" alias="cas.id_struct"/>
  </join>
  
  <join detail_table="{pj}_evt_data" detail_alias="evt" sql="{evt.id_data}={cas.id_evt}" type="inner" detail_varset_name="evt" mode="rw">
    <field table_name="evt" field_name="id_data" alias="evt.id_data"/>
    <field table_name="cas" field_name="id_evt" alias="cas.id_evt"/>
  </join>
  
  <!-- 406 = Relance FSD à corriger -->
  <join detail_table="{pj}_relance_data" detail_alias="relance" sql="{relance.id_fsd}={fsd.id_data} AND {relance.rel_sujet} = 406" type="left" detail_varset_name="relance" mode="rw">
    <field table_name="relance" field_name="id_fsd" alias="relance.id_fsd"/>
    <field table_name="relance" field_name="rel_sujet" alias="relance.rel_sujet"/>
    <field table_name="fsd" field_name="id_data" alias="fsd.id_data"/>
  </join>
  
  <!-- 244 = A corriger-->
  <condition sql="{fsd.fsd_statut}=244">
    <field field_name="fsd_statut" alias="fsd.fsd_statut" table_name="fsd"/>
  </condition>
  
  <!-- 1 ligne par FSD -->
  <group_by sql="{fsd.id_data}">
    <field field_name="id_data" table_name="fsd" alias="fsd.id_data"/>
  </group_by>
  
  <!--  * si pas encore de relance 
		* si la dernière relance à j-{y2} -->
  <having sql="(COUNT({relance.id_data}) = 0) OR (MAX({relance.relance_date_realisation}) < CURDATE() - INTERVAL {y2} DAY)">
    <field field_name="id_data" table_name="relance" alias="relance.id_data"/>
    <field field_name="relance_date_realisation" table_name="relance" alias="relance.relance_date_realisation"/>
    <variable alias="y2" default="null">
      <entry type="param" name="param_relance_fsd_a_corrige_delai"/>
      <entry type="dataset" name="param_relance" row="current" field="param_relance_fsd_a_corrige_delai"/>
    </variable>
  </having>	  

</dataquery>

<dataquery id="msg_relance" table_name="{pj}_param_relance_data" table_alias="rel" varset_name="param_relance">
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="rel" />
  
  <column sql="CONCAT( 'Si un MEH est au statut "Non déclaré" en fin de semaine, le système attend ', {param_relance_meh_nb_jour_1ere_relance}, ' jour(s) avant de proposer une première relance téléphonique. Puis des relances sont proposées ', {param_relance_meh_nb_jour_relances}, ' jour(s) avec une relance tous les ', {param_relance_meh_non_recu_delai},' jour(s). Ensuite plus aucune relance n''est proposée.' )" alias="msg_1" type="string">
    <field table_name="rel" field_name="param_relance_meh_nb_jour_1ere_relance" alias="param_relance_meh_nb_jour_1ere_relance"/>
    <field table_name="rel" field_name="param_relance_meh_nb_jour_relances" alias="param_relance_meh_nb_jour_relances"/>
    <field table_name="rel" field_name="param_relance_meh_non_recu_delai" alias="param_relance_meh_non_recu_delai"/>
  </column>
  
  <column sql="CONCAT( 'Si un MEH est au statut "A corriger", un mail automatique est envoyé au déclarant pour lui signaler que son MEH a été rejeté. L''objet et le corps du mail sont définis ici. Ensuite une relance téléphonique est proposée tous les ', {param_relance_meh_a_corrige_delai}, ' jours jusqu''à correction du MEH.' )" alias="msg_2" type="string">
    <field table_name="rel" field_name="param_relance_meh_a_corrige_delai" alias="param_relance_meh_a_corrige_delai"/>
  </column>
  
  <column sql="CONCAT( 'Si une FSD est au statut "Non finalisée", le système attend ', {param_relance_fsd_nb_jour_1ere_relance}, ' jours avant de proposer une première relance. Puis les relances sont proposées tous les ', {param_relance_fsd_nb_jour_relances_mail}, ' jours. Les ', {param_relance_fsd_non_recue_delai}, ' premières relances s''effectuent par mail, les suivantes sont des relances téléphoniques.' )" alias="msg_3" type="string">
    <field table_name="rel" field_name="param_relance_fsd_nb_jour_1ere_relance" alias="param_relance_fsd_nb_jour_1ere_relance"/>
    <field table_name="rel" field_name="param_relance_fsd_nb_jour_relances_mail" alias="param_relance_fsd_nb_jour_relances_mail"/>
    <field table_name="rel" field_name="param_relance_fsd_non_recue_delai" alias="param_relance_fsd_non_recue_delai"/>
  </column>
  
  <column sql="CONCAT( 'Si une FSD est au statut "A corriger", un mail automatique est envoyé au déclarant pour lui signaler que sa FSD a été rejetée. L''objet et le corps du mail sont définis ici. Ensuite une relance téléphonique est proposée tous les ', {param_relance_fsd_a_corrige_delai}, ' jours jusqu''à correction de la FSD.' )" alias="msg_4" type="string">
    <field table_name="rel" field_name="param_relance_fsd_a_corrige_delai" alias="param_relance_fsd_a_corrige_delai"/>
  </column> 
  
</dataquery>

<dataquery id="struct" table_name="{pj}_struct_data" varset_name="struct" table_alias="struct" mode="r">
  <!-- structure déclarante -->
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="struct" />
  <column sql="CONCAT({struct.str_code_cespa}, ' - ', {struct.str_libelle_long})" alias="label" type="string">
    <field field_name="str_code_cespa" table_name="struct" alias="struct.str_code_cespa" />
    <field field_name="str_libelle_long" table_name="struct" alias="struct.str_libelle_long" />
  </column>
  <condition sql="{struct.id_data} = {_struct}">
    <field field_name="id_data" table_name="struct" alias="struct.id_data" />
    <variable alias="_struct" default="0">
      <entry type="param" name="id_structure" />
    </variable>
  </condition>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="msg" table_name="{pj}_message_admin_data" varset_name="message_admin" table_alias="msg" mode="r">
  <!-- liste des Messages -->
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="msg" />
  <column_simple field_name="mess_adm_titre" table_name="msg" />
  <column_simple field_name="mess_adm_message" table_name="msg" />
  <column sql="{dico.code}" alias="couleur" type="string">
    <field table_name="dico" field_name="code" alias="dico.code"/>
  </column>
  <!-- parametre trop complexe pour la requete, remplit par un traitement PHP -->
  <column sql="null" alias="hidden" type="string" />
  <!--  definition des cibles (role,groupe) des messages  -->
  <column sql="GROUP_CONCAT( {c.cma_id_role}, ':', {c.cma_id_groupe} SEPARATOR '#' )" alias="cibles" type="string">
    <field table_name="c" field_name="cma_id_role" alias="c.cma_id_role"/>
    <field table_name="c" field_name="cma_id_groupe" alias="c.cma_id_groupe"/>
  </column>
  <joins>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_dico_data" detail_alias="dico" type="left" mode="r"
          sql="{msg.mess_adm_couleur} = {dico.id_data}" >
      <field table_name="msg" field_name="mess_adm_couleur" alias="msg.mess_adm_couleur"/>
      <field table_name="dico" field_name="id_data" alias="dico.id_data"/>
    </join>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_cible_message_admin_data" detail_alias="c" type="left" mode="r"
          sql="{msg.id_data} = {c.id_message_admin}" >
      <field table_name="c" field_name="id_message_admin" alias="c.id_message_admin"/>
      <field table_name="msg" field_name="id_data" alias="msg.id_data"/>
    </join>
  </joins>
  <condition sql="current_date BETWEEN COALESCE({msg.mess_adm_date_debut}, '2000-01-01') AND COALESCE({msg.mess_adm_date_fin}, '2999-12-31')">
    <field field_name="mess_adm_date_debut" table_name="msg" alias="msg.mess_adm_date_debut"/>
    <field field_name="mess_adm_date_fin" table_name="msg" alias="msg.mess_adm_date_fin"/>
  </condition>
  <group_by sql="{msg.id_data}">
    <field table_name="msg" field_name="id_data" alias="msg.id_data"/>
  </group_by>
  <order_by sql="{msg.id_data} DESC">
    <field table_name="msg" field_name="id_data" alias="msg.id_data"/>
  </order_by>
</dataquery>

attrs.value:
<dataquery id="meh" table_name="{pj}_meh_data" varset_name="meh" table_alias="meh" mode="r" begin="0" range="20">
  <!-- liste des MEH de la structure declarante -->
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="meh"/>
  <column_simple field_name="meh_num" table_name="meh" />
  <column_simple field_name="meh_annee" table_name="meh" />
  <column_simple field_name="meh_semaine" table_name="meh" />
  <column sql="COUNT(cas.id_data)" alias="nb_cas">
    <field field_name="id_data" table_name="cas" alias="cas.id_data" />
  </column>
  <column_simple field_name="meh_statut" table_name="meh" />
  <joins>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_cas_data" detail_alias="cas" type="left" mode="r"
          sql="{meh.meh_annee}=DATE_FORMAT({cas.cas_date}, '%x') AND {meh.meh_semaine} = DATE_FORMAT({cas.cas_date}, '%v') 
               AND {meh.id_struct} = {cas.id_struct}" >
      <field table_name="meh" field_name="meh_annee" alias="meh.meh_annee"/>
      <field table_name="meh" field_name="meh_semaine" alias="meh.meh_semaine"/>
      <field table_name="meh" field_name="id_struct" alias="meh.id_struct"/>
      <field table_name="cas" field_name="cas_date" alias="cas.cas_date"/>
      <field table_name="cas" field_name="id_struct" alias="cas.id_struct"/>
    </join>
  </joins>
  <condition sql="{meh.id_struct} = {_struct}">
    <field field_name="id_struct" table_name="meh" alias="meh.id_struct" />
    <variable alias="_struct" default="0">
      <entry type="param" name="id_structure" />
    </variable>
  </condition>
  <condition sql="COALESCE({meh.meh_statut}, 382) IN (382,384)">
    <field field_name="meh_statut" table_name="meh" alias="meh.meh_statut"/>
  </condition>
  <group_by sql="{meh.id_data}">
    <field field_name="id_data" table_name="meh" alias="meh.id_data" />
  </group_by>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="fsd" table_name="{pj}_fsd_data" varset_name="fsd" table_alias="fsd" begin="0" range="20">
  <!-- liste des FSD de la structure declarante -->
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="fsd"/>
  <column sql="CONCAT({evt.evt_code}, ' - ', {evt.evt_libelle_court})" alias="evenement" type="string">
    <field table_name="evt" field_name="evt_code" alias="evt.evt_code"/>
    <field table_name="evt" field_name="evt_libelle_court" alias="evt.evt_libelle_court"/>
  </column>

  <column sql="{cas_date}" alias="cas_date" type="date">
    <field table_name="cas" field_name="cas_date" alias="cas_date"/>
  </column>

  <column_simple field_name="cas_date" table_name="cas"/>
  <column_simple field_name="cas_numero" table_name="cas" />

  <column sql="IF({evt.evt_fsd} = 10, {cas.cas_numero}, '')" alias="cas_numero_str" type="string">
    <field table_name="evt" field_name="evt_fsd" alias="evt.evt_fsd"/>
    <field table_name="cas" field_name="cas_numero" alias="cas.cas_numero"/>
  </column>

  <column_simple field_name="fsd_statut" table_name="fsd" />
  <joins>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_cas_data" detail_alias="cas" type="left" mode="r"
          sql="{fsd.id_cas}={cas.id_data}" detail_varset_name="cas" >
      <field table_name="fsd" field_name="id_cas" alias="fsd.id_cas"/>
      <field table_name="cas" field_name="id_data" alias="cas.id_data"/>
    </join>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_evt_data" detail_alias="evt" type="inner" mode="r"
          sql="{evt.id_data}={cas.id_evt}" detail_varset_name="evt">
      <field table_name="evt" field_name="id_data" alias="evt.id_data"/>
      <field table_name="cas" field_name="id_evt" alias="cas.id_evt"/>
    </join>
  </joins>
  <condition sql="{cas.id_struct} = {_struct}">
    <field field_name="id_struct" table_name="cas" alias="cas.id_struct" />
    <variable alias="_struct" default="0">
      <entry type="param" name="id_structure" />
    </variable>
  </condition>
  <condition sql="COALESCE({fsd.fsd_statut}, 241) IN (241, 244)">
    <field field_name="fsd_statut" table_name="fsd" alias="fsd.fsd_statut"/>
  </condition>
</dataquery>

<dataquery id="alertes" table_name="{pj}_alerte_data" varset_name="alerte" table_alias="alrt" mode="r" begin="0" range="20">
  <!-- liste des alertes (non liées à la structure déclarante !) -->
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="alrt"/>
  <column sql="CONCAT({evt.evt_code}, ' - ', {evt.evt_libelle_court})" alias="evenement" type="string">
    <field table_name="evt" field_name="evt_code" alias="evt.evt_code"/>
    <field table_name="evt" field_name="evt_libelle_court" alias="evt.evt_libelle_court"/>
  </column>
  <column_simple field_name="alerte_sujet" table_name="alrt" />
  <column_simple field_name="alerte_type" table_name="alrt" />
  <column_simple field_name="alerte_date_ouverture" table_name="alrt" />
  <column sql="null" alias="nb_actions" type="string">
    <field table_name="alrt" field_name="id_data" alias="alrt.id_data"/>
  </column>
  <joins>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_evt_data" detail_alias="evt" type="inner" mode="r"
          sql="{evt.id_data}={alrt.id_evt}" >
      <field table_name="evt" field_name="id_data" alias="evt.id_data"/>
      <field table_name="alrt" field_name="id_evt" alias="alrt.id_evt"/>
    </join>
  </joins>
  <condition sql="COALESCE({alrt.alerte_statut}, 329) IN (329)">
    <field field_name="alerte_statut" table_name="alrt" alias="alrt.alerte_statut"/>
  </condition>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<!-- liste des Périodes de fermetures -->
<dataquery id="periodes" table_name="{pj}_prd_data" varset_name="prd" table_alias="prd" mode="r" begin="0" range="20">
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="prd"/>
  <column_simple field_name="prd_label" table_name="prd"/>
  <column_simple field_name="prd_start" table_name="prd"/>
  <column_simple field_name="prd_end" table_name="prd"/>
  <joins>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_struct_data" detail_alias="str" type="inner" mode="r" sql="{str.id_data}={prd.id_struct}">
      <field table_name="str" field_name="id_data" alias="str.id_data"/>
      <field table_name="prd" field_name="id_struct" alias="prd.id_struct"/>
    </join>
  </joins>
  <condition sql="CURRENT_DATE <= {prd.prd_end} AND CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL 6 MONTH > {prd.prd_start}">
    <field table_name="prd" field_name="prd_end" alias="prd.prd_end"/>
    <field table_name="prd" field_name="prd_start" alias="prd.prd_start"/>
  </condition>
  <order_by sql="{prd.prd_end}">
    <field table_name="prd" field_name="prd_end" alias="prd.prd_end"/>
  </order_by>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="struct" table_name="{pj}_struct_data" varset_name="struct" table_alias="struct" mode="r">
  <!-- structure déclarante -->
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="struct" />
  <column sql="CONCAT({struct.str_code_cespa}, ' - ', {struct.str_libelle_long})" alias="label" type="string">
    <field field_name="str_code_cespa" table_name="struct" alias="struct.str_code_cespa" />
    <field field_name="str_libelle_long" table_name="struct" alias="struct.str_libelle_long" />
  </column>
  <condition sql="{struct.id_data} = {_struct}">
    <field field_name="id_data" table_name="struct" alias="struct.id_data" />
    <variable alias="_struct" default="0">
      <entry type="param" name="id_structure" />
    </variable>
  </condition>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="msg" table_name="{pj}_message_admin_data" varset_name="message_admin" table_alias="msg" mode="r">
  <!-- liste des Messages -->
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="msg" />
  <column_simple field_name="mess_adm_titre" table_name="msg" />
  <column_simple field_name="mess_adm_message" table_name="msg" />
  <column sql="{dico.code}" alias="couleur" type="string">
    <field table_name="dico" field_name="code" alias="dico.code"/>
  </column>
  <!-- parametre trop complexe pour la requete, remplit par un traitement PHP -->
  <column sql="null" alias="hidden" type="string" />
  <!--  definition des cibles (role,groupe) des messages  -->
  <column sql="GROUP_CONCAT( {c.cma_id_role}, ':', {c.cma_id_groupe} SEPARATOR '#' )" alias="cibles" type="string">
    <field table_name="c" field_name="cma_id_role" alias="c.cma_id_role"/>
    <field table_name="c" field_name="cma_id_groupe" alias="c.cma_id_groupe"/>
  </column>
  <joins>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_dico_data" detail_alias="dico" type="left" mode="r"
          sql="{msg.mess_adm_couleur} = {dico.id_data}" >
      <field table_name="msg" field_name="mess_adm_couleur" alias="msg.mess_adm_couleur"/>
      <field table_name="dico" field_name="id_data" alias="dico.id_data"/>
    </join>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_cible_message_admin_data" detail_alias="c" type="left" mode="r"
          sql="{msg.id_data} = {c.id_message_admin}" >
      <field table_name="c" field_name="id_message_admin" alias="c.id_message_admin"/>
      <field table_name="msg" field_name="id_data" alias="msg.id_data"/>
    </join>
  </joins>
  <condition sql="current_date BETWEEN COALESCE({msg.mess_adm_date_debut}, '2000-01-01') AND COALESCE({msg.mess_adm_date_fin}, '2999-12-31')">
    <field field_name="mess_adm_date_debut" table_name="msg" alias="msg.mess_adm_date_debut"/>
    <field field_name="mess_adm_date_fin" table_name="msg" alias="msg.mess_adm_date_fin"/>
  </condition>
  <group_by sql="{msg.id_data}">
    <field table_name="msg" field_name="id_data" alias="msg.id_data"/>
  </group_by>
  <order_by sql="{msg.id_data} DESC">
    <field table_name="msg" field_name="id_data" alias="msg.id_data"/>
  </order_by>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="alertes" table_name="{pj}_alerte_data" varset_name="alerte" table_alias="alrt" mode="r" begin="0" range="20">
  <!-- liste des alertes (non liées à la structure déclarante !) -->
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="alrt"/>
  <column sql="CONCAT({evt.evt_code}, ' - ', {evt.evt_libelle_court})" alias="evenement" type="string">
    <field table_name="evt" field_name="evt_code" alias="evt.evt_code"/>
    <field table_name="evt" field_name="evt_libelle_court" alias="evt.evt_libelle_court"/>
  </column>
  <column_simple field_name="alerte_sujet" table_name="alrt" />
  <column_simple field_name="alerte_type" table_name="alrt" />
  <column_simple field_name="alerte_date_ouverture" table_name="alrt" />
  <column sql="null" alias="nb_actions" type="string">
    <field table_name="alrt" field_name="id_data" alias="alrt.id_data"/>
  </column>
  <joins>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_evt_data" detail_alias="evt" type="inner" mode="r"
          sql="{evt.id_data}={alrt.id_evt}" >
      <field table_name="evt" field_name="id_data" alias="evt.id_data"/>
      <field table_name="alrt" field_name="id_evt" alias="alrt.id_evt"/>
    </join>
  </joins>
  <condition sql="COALESCE({alrt.alerte_statut}, 329) IN (329)">
    <field field_name="alerte_statut" table_name="alrt" alias="alrt.alerte_statut"/>
  </condition>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="bn" table_name="{pj}_bloc_notes_str_data" varset_name="bloc_notes_str" table_alias="bn" mode="rw" range="1">
  <!-- fiche Bloc-note de la structure déclarante -->
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="bn"/>
  <column_simple field_name="id_struct" table_name="bn"/>
  <column_simple field_name="bloc_notes_notes" table_name="bn"/>
  <variables>
    <variable alias="extern_id_struct" default="0" target_column="id_struct">
      <entry type="param" name="id_structure" />
      <entry type="dataset" name="bn" field="id_struct" row="current" />
    </variable>
  </variables>
  <condition sql="{bn.id_struct} = {_struct}">
    <field field_name="id_struct" table_name="bn" alias="bn.id_struct" />
    <variable alias="_struct" default="0">
      <entry type="param" name="id_structure" />
    </variable>
  </condition>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<!-- Compteurs MEH -->
<dataquery id="count_meh" table_name="{pj}_meh_data" varset_name="meh" table_alias="meh" mode="r">
  <column_simple field_name="meh_annee" table_name="meh"/>
  <column_simple field_name="meh_semaine" table_name="meh"/>
  <!--  ugim_cespa + epidemio cespa -->
  <column sql="SUM(1)" alias="meh_attendus" type="string" default_label="Attendus">
    <field table_name="meh" field_name="meh_statut" alias="meh.meh_statut"/>
  </column>
  <!--  ugim_cespa + epidemio cespa -->
  <column sql="SUM( CASE WHEN {meh.meh_statut} = 383 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )" alias="meh_avalider" type="string" default_label="A valider">
    <field table_name="meh" field_name="meh_statut" alias="meh.meh_statut"/>
  </column>
  <!--  ugim_cespa -->
  <column sql="SUM( CASE WHEN {meh.meh_statut} = 384 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )" alias="meh_acorriger" type="string" default_label="A corriger"> 
    <field table_name="meh" field_name="meh_statut" alias="meh.meh_statut"/>
  </column>
  <condition sql="{meh.meh_annee} = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 WEEK, '%x')">
    <field table_name="meh" field_name="meh_annee" alias="meh.meh_annee"/>
  </condition>
  <condition sql="{meh.meh_semaine} = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 WEEK, '%v')">
    <field table_name="meh" field_name="meh_semaine" alias="meh.meh_semaine"/>
  </condition>
  <group_by sql="{meh.meh_annee}">
    <field table_name="meh" field_name="meh_annee" alias="meh.meh_annee"/>
  </group_by>
  <group_by sql="{meh.meh_semaine}">
    <field table_name="meh" field_name="meh_semaine" alias="meh.meh_semaine"/>
  </group_by>
</dataquery>

attrs.value:
<!-- Compteurs FSD -->
<dataquery id="count_fsd" table_name="{pj}_fsd_data" varset_name="fsd" table_alias="fsd" mode="r">
  <!--  ugim_cespa -->
  <column sql="SUM( CASE WHEN {fsd.fsd_statut} = 241 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )" alias="fsd_attendues" type="string" default_label="Attendues">
    <field table_name="fsd" field_name="fsd_statut" alias="fsd.fsd_statut"/>
  </column>
  <!--  ugim_cespa + epidemio cespa -->
  <column sql="SUM( CASE WHEN {fsd.fsd_statut} = 242 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )" alias="fsd_avalider" type="string" default_label="A valider">
    <field table_name="fsd" field_name="fsd_statut" alias="fsd.fsd_statut"/>
  </column>
  <!--  ugim_cespa -->
  <column sql="SUM( CASE WHEN {fsd.fsd_statut} = 244 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )" alias="fsd_acorriger" type="string" default_label="A corriger">
    <field table_name="fsd" field_name="fsd_statut" alias="fsd.fsd_statut"/>
  </column>
</dataquery>

  <column_simple field_name="param_relance_meh_non_recu_delai" table_name="rel"/>
  <!-- MEH à corriger -->
  <column_simple field_name="param_relance_meh_a_corrige_delai" table_name="rel"/>
  <column_simple field_name="param_relance_meh_objet_mail" table_name="rel"/>
  <column_simple field_name="param_relance_meh_corps_mail" table_name="rel"/>
  <!-- FSD non reçue -->
  <column_simple field_name="param_relance_fsd_nb_jour_1ere_relance" table_name="rel"/>

  <column_simple field_name="param_relance_fsd_non_recue_delai" table_name="rel"/>
  <column_simple field_name="param_relance_fsd_non_recue_objet_mail" table_name="rel"/>
  <column_simple field_name="param_relance_fsd_non_recue_corps_mail" table_name="rel"/>
  <!-- FSD à corriger -->
  <column_simple field_name="param_relance_fsd_a_corrige_delai" table_name="rel"/>
  <column_simple field_name="param_relance_fsd_a_corrige_objet_mail" table_name="rel"/>
  <column_simple field_name="param_relance_fsd_a_corrige_corps_mail" table_name="rel"/>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="relances_403" table_name="{pj}_meh_data" varset_name="meh" table_alias="meh" mode="r">
  <column sql="COUNT(0)" alias="compteur" type="string" default_label="MEH non reçu" >
    <field table_name="meh" field_name="meh_correction" alias="dummy"/>
  </column>
  <condition sql="{meh.meh_statut}=382">
    <field field_name="meh_statut" alias="meh.meh_statut" table_name="meh"/>
  </condition>
  <condition sql="STR_TO_DATE( concat( {meh.meh_annee}, {meh.meh_semaine}, ' Sunday'), '%x%v %W') < ( CURDATE() - INTERVAL {x3} DAY )">
    <field field_name="meh_annee" alias="meh.meh_annee" table_name="meh"/>
    <field field_name="meh_semaine" alias="meh.meh_semaine" table_name="meh"/>
    <variable alias="x3" default="null">
      <entry type="param" name="param_relance_meh_nb_jour_1ere_relance"/>
      <entry type="dataset" name="param_relance" row="current" field="param_relance_meh_nb_jour_1ere_relance"/>
    </variable> 
  </condition>
  <condition sql="( 
    NOT EXISTS( 
      SELECT null FROM osea_relance_data WHERE id_meh={meh.id_data} AND rel_sujet = 403 
    ) 
    OR (
      CURDATE() - INTERVAL {y3} DAY > ALL(
        SELECT relance_date_realisation FROM osea_relance_data WHERE id_meh={meh.id_data} AND rel_sujet = 403 
      ) AND 
      CURDATE() + INTERVAL {z3} DAY < ALL (
        SELECT relance_date_realisation FROM osea_relance_data WHERE id_meh={meh.id_data} AND rel_sujet = 403 
      )
    ) 
  )">
    <field field_name="id_data" table_name="meh" alias="meh.id_data"/>
    <variable alias="y3" default="null">
      <entry type="param" name="param_relance_meh_non_recu_delai"/>
      <entry type="dataset" name="param_relance" row="current" field="param_relance_meh_non_recu_delai"/>
    </variable>
    <variable alias="z3" default="null">
      <entry type="param" name="param_relance_meh_nb_jour_relances"/>
      <entry type="dataset" name="param_relance" row="current" field="param_relance_meh_nb_jour_relances"/>
    </variable>
  </condition>
</dataquery>

<!-- liste des Périodes de fermetures -->
<dataquery id="periodes" table_name="{pj}_prd_data" varset_name="prd" table_alias="prd" mode="r" begin="0" range="20">
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="prd"/>
  <column_simple field_name="prd_label" table_name="prd"/>
  <column_simple field_name="prd_start" table_name="prd"/>
  <column_simple field_name="prd_end" table_name="prd"/>
  <column sql="CONCAT({str.str_code_cespa}, ' - ', {str.str_libelle_long})" alias="structure" type="string">
    <field field_name="str_code_cespa" table_name="str" alias="str.str_code_cespa"/> 
    <field field_name="str_libelle_long" table_name="str" alias="str.str_libelle_long"/> 
  </column>
  <joins>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_struct_data" detail_alias="str" type="inner" mode="r" sql="{str.id_data}={prd.id_struct}">
      <field table_name="str" field_name="id_data" alias="str.id_data"/>
      <field table_name="prd" field_name="id_struct" alias="prd.id_struct"/>
    </join>
  </joins>
  <condition sql="CURRENT_DATE <= {prd.prd_end} AND CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL 6 MONTH > {prd.prd_start}">
    <field table_name="prd" field_name="prd_end" alias="prd.prd_end"/>
    <field table_name="prd" field_name="prd_start" alias="prd.prd_start"/>
  </condition>
  <order_by sql="{prd.prd_end}">
    <field table_name="prd" field_name="prd_end" alias="prd.prd_end"/>
  </order_by>
</dataquery>

<dataquery id="struct" table_name="{pj}_struct_data" varset_name="struct" table_alias="struct" mode="r">
  <!-- structure déclarante -->
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="struct" />
  <column sql="CONCAT({struct.str_code_cespa}, ' - ', {struct.str_libelle_long})" alias="label" type="string">
    <field field_name="str_code_cespa" table_name="struct" alias="struct.str_code_cespa" />
    <field field_name="str_libelle_long" table_name="struct" alias="struct.str_libelle_long" />
  </column>
  <condition sql="{struct.id_data} = {_struct}">
    <field field_name="id_data" table_name="struct" alias="struct.id_data" />
    <variable alias="_struct" default="0">
      <entry type="param" name="id_structure" />
    </variable>
  </condition>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="msg" table_name="{pj}_message_admin_data" varset_name="message_admin" table_alias="msg" mode="r">
  <!-- liste des Messages -->
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="msg" />
  <column_simple field_name="mess_adm_titre" table_name="msg" />
  <column_simple field_name="mess_adm_message" table_name="msg" />
  <column sql="{dico.code}" alias="couleur" type="string">
    <field table_name="dico" field_name="code" alias="dico.code"/>
  </column>
  <!-- parametre trop complexe pour la requete, remplit par un traitement PHP -->
  <column sql="null" alias="hidden" type="string" />
  <!--  definition des cibles (role,groupe) des messages  -->
  <column sql="GROUP_CONCAT( {c.cma_id_role}, ':', {c.cma_id_groupe} SEPARATOR '#' )" alias="cibles" type="string">
    <field table_name="c" field_name="cma_id_role" alias="c.cma_id_role"/>
    <field table_name="c" field_name="cma_id_groupe" alias="c.cma_id_groupe"/>
  </column>
  <joins>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_dico_data" detail_alias="dico" type="left" mode="r"
          sql="{msg.mess_adm_couleur} = {dico.id_data}" >
      <field table_name="msg" field_name="mess_adm_couleur" alias="msg.mess_adm_couleur"/>
      <field table_name="dico" field_name="id_data" alias="dico.id_data"/>
    </join>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_cible_message_admin_data" detail_alias="c" type="left" mode="r"
          sql="{msg.id_data} = {c.id_message_admin}" >
      <field table_name="c" field_name="id_message_admin" alias="c.id_message_admin"/>
      <field table_name="msg" field_name="id_data" alias="msg.id_data"/>
    </join>
  </joins>
  <condition sql="current_date BETWEEN COALESCE({msg.mess_adm_date_debut}, '2000-01-01') AND COALESCE({msg.mess_adm_date_fin}, '2999-12-31')">
    <field field_name="mess_adm_date_debut" table_name="msg" alias="msg.mess_adm_date_debut"/>
    <field field_name="mess_adm_date_fin" table_name="msg" alias="msg.mess_adm_date_fin"/>
  </condition>
  <group_by sql="{msg.id_data}">
    <field table_name="msg" field_name="id_data" alias="msg.id_data"/>
  </group_by>
  <order_by sql="{msg.id_data} DESC">
    <field table_name="msg" field_name="id_data" alias="msg.id_data"/>
  </order_by>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="alertes" table_name="{pj}_alerte_data" varset_name="alerte" table_alias="alrt" mode="r" begin="0" range="20">
  <!-- liste des alertes (non liées à la structure déclarante !) -->
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="alrt"/>
  <column sql="CONCAT({evt.evt_code}, ' - ', {evt.evt_libelle_court})" alias="evenement" type="string">
    <field table_name="evt" field_name="evt_code" alias="evt.evt_code"/>
    <field table_name="evt" field_name="evt_libelle_court" alias="evt.evt_libelle_court"/>
  </column>
  <column_simple field_name="alerte_sujet" table_name="alrt" />
  <column_simple field_name="alerte_type" table_name="alrt" />
  <column_simple field_name="alerte_date_ouverture" table_name="alrt" />
  <column sql="null" alias="nb_actions" type="string">
    <field table_name="alrt" field_name="id_data" alias="alrt.id_data"/>
  </column>
  <joins>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_evt_data" detail_alias="evt" type="inner" mode="r"
          sql="{evt.id_data}={alrt.id_evt}" >
      <field table_name="evt" field_name="id_data" alias="evt.id_data"/>
      <field table_name="alrt" field_name="id_evt" alias="alrt.id_evt"/>
    </join>
  </joins>
  <condition sql="COALESCE({alrt.alerte_statut}, 329) IN (329)">
    <field field_name="alerte_statut" table_name="alrt" alias="alrt.alerte_statut"/>
  </condition>
</dataquery>

<!-- Compteurs MEH -->
<dataquery id="count_meh" table_name="{pj}_meh_data" varset_name="meh" table_alias="meh" mode="r" begin="0" range="20">
  <column_simple field_name="meh_annee" table_name="meh"/>
  <column_simple field_name="meh_semaine" table_name="meh"/>
  <!--  ugim_cespa + epidemio cespa -->
  <column sql="SUM(1)" alias="meh_attendus" type="string" default_label="Attendus">
    <field table_name="meh" field_name="meh_statut" alias="meh.meh_statut"/>
  </column>
  <!--  ugim_cespa + epidemio cespa -->
  <column sql="SUM( CASE WHEN {meh.meh_statut} = 383 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )" alias="meh_avalider" type="string" default_label="A valider">
    <field table_name="meh" field_name="meh_statut" alias="meh.meh_statut"/>
  </column>
  <!--  ugim_cespa -->
  <column sql="SUM( CASE WHEN {meh.meh_statut} = 384 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )" alias="meh_acorriger" type="string" default_label="A corriger"> 
    <field table_name="meh" field_name="meh_statut" alias="meh.meh_statut"/>
  </column>
  <condition sql="{meh.meh_annee} = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 WEEK, '%x')">
    <field table_name="meh" field_name="meh_annee" alias="meh.meh_annee"/>
  </condition>
  <condition sql="{meh.meh_semaine} = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 WEEK, '%v')">
    <field table_name="meh" field_name="meh_semaine" alias="meh.meh_semaine"/>
  </condition>
  <group_by sql="{meh.meh_annee}">
    <field table_name="meh" field_name="meh_annee" alias="meh.meh_annee"/>
  </group_by>
  <group_by sql="{meh.meh_semaine}">
    <field table_name="meh" field_name="meh_semaine" alias="meh.meh_semaine"/>
  </group_by>
</dataquery>

<dataquery id="struct" table_name="{pj}_struct_data" varset_name="struct" table_alias="struct" mode="r">
  <!-- structure déclarante -->
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="struct" />
  <column sql="CONCAT({struct.str_code_cespa}, ' - ', {struct.str_libelle_long})" alias="label" type="string">
    <field field_name="str_code_cespa" table_name="struct" alias="struct.str_code_cespa" />
    <field field_name="str_libelle_long" table_name="struct" alias="struct.str_libelle_long" />
  </column>
  <condition sql="{struct.id_data} = {_struct}">
    <field field_name="id_data" table_name="struct" alias="struct.id_data" />
    <variable alias="_struct" default="0">
      <entry type="param" name="id_structure" />
    </variable>
  </condition>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="msg" table_name="{pj}_message_admin_data" varset_name="message_admin" table_alias="msg" mode="r">
  <!-- liste des Messages -->
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="msg" />
  <column_simple field_name="mess_adm_titre" table_name="msg" />
  <column_simple field_name="mess_adm_message" table_name="msg" />
  <column sql="{dico.code}" alias="couleur" type="string">
    <field table_name="dico" field_name="code" alias="dico.code"/>
  </column>
  <!-- parametre trop complexe pour la requete, remplit par un traitement PHP -->
  <column sql="null" alias="hidden" type="string" />
  <!--  definition des cibles (role,groupe) des messages  -->
  <column sql="GROUP_CONCAT( {c.cma_id_role}, ':', {c.cma_id_groupe} SEPARATOR '#' )" alias="cibles" type="string">
    <field table_name="c" field_name="cma_id_role" alias="c.cma_id_role"/>
    <field table_name="c" field_name="cma_id_groupe" alias="c.cma_id_groupe"/>
  </column>
  <joins>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_dico_data" detail_alias="dico" type="left" mode="r"
          sql="{msg.mess_adm_couleur} = {dico.id_data}" >
      <field table_name="msg" field_name="mess_adm_couleur" alias="msg.mess_adm_couleur"/>
      <field table_name="dico" field_name="id_data" alias="dico.id_data"/>
    </join>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_cible_message_admin_data" detail_alias="c" type="left" mode="r"
          sql="{msg.id_data} = {c.id_message_admin}" >
      <field table_name="c" field_name="id_message_admin" alias="c.id_message_admin"/>
      <field table_name="msg" field_name="id_data" alias="msg.id_data"/>
    </join>
  </joins>
  <condition sql="current_date BETWEEN COALESCE({msg.mess_adm_date_debut}, '2000-01-01') AND COALESCE({msg.mess_adm_date_fin}, '2999-12-31')">
    <field field_name="mess_adm_date_debut" table_name="msg" alias="msg.mess_adm_date_debut"/>
    <field field_name="mess_adm_date_fin" table_name="msg" alias="msg.mess_adm_date_fin"/>
  </condition>
  <group_by sql="{msg.id_data}">
    <field table_name="msg" field_name="id_data" alias="msg.id_data"/>
  </group_by>
  <order_by sql="{msg.id_data} DESC">
    <field table_name="msg" field_name="id_data" alias="msg.id_data"/>
  </order_by>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="bn" table_name="{pj}_bloc_notes_str_data" varset_name="bloc_notes_str" table_alias="bn" mode="rw" range="1">
  <!-- fiche Bloc-note de la structure déclarante -->
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="bn"/>
  <column_simple field_name="id_struct" table_name="bn"/>
  <column_simple field_name="bloc_notes_notes" table_name="bn"/>
  <variables>
    <variable alias="extern_id_struct" default="0" target_column="id_struct">
      <entry type="param" name="id_structure" />
      <entry type="dataset" name="bn" field="id_struct" row="current" />
    </variable>
  </variables>
  <condition sql="{bn.id_struct} = {_struct}">
    <field field_name="id_struct" table_name="bn" alias="bn.id_struct" />
    <variable alias="_struct" default="0">
      <entry type="param" name="id_structure" />
    </variable>
  </condition>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<!-- liste des Périodes de fermetures -->
<dataquery id="periodes" table_name="{pj}_prd_data" varset_name="prd" table_alias="prd" mode="r" begin="0" range="20">
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="prd"/>
  <column_simple field_name="prd_label" table_name="prd"/>
  <column_simple field_name="prd_start" table_name="prd"/>
  <column_simple field_name="prd_end" table_name="prd"/>
  <column sql="CONCAT({str.str_code_cespa}, ' - ', {str.str_libelle_long})" alias="structure" type="string">
    <field field_name="str_code_cespa" table_name="str" alias="str.str_code_cespa"/> 
    <field field_name="str_libelle_long" table_name="str" alias="str.str_libelle_long"/> 
  </column>
  <joins>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_struct_data" detail_alias="str" type="inner" mode="r" sql="{str.id_data}={prd.id_struct}">
      <field table_name="str" field_name="id_data" alias="str.id_data"/>
      <field table_name="prd" field_name="id_struct" alias="prd.id_struct"/>
    </join>
  </joins>
  <condition sql="CURRENT_DATE <= {prd.prd_end} AND CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL 6 MONTH > {prd.prd_start}">
    <field table_name="prd" field_name="prd_end" alias="prd.prd_end"/>
    <field table_name="prd" field_name="prd_start" alias="prd.prd_start"/>
  </condition>
  <order_by sql="{prd.prd_end}">
    <field table_name="prd" field_name="prd_end" alias="prd.prd_end"/>
  </order_by>
</dataquery>

<dataquery id="relance" table_name="{pj}_relance_data" varset_name="relance" table_alias="relance" mode="rw">

	<column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="relance" />
  	<column_simple field_name="relance_date_realisation" table_name="relance" />
	<column_simple field_name="rel_moyen_comm" table_name="relance" />
	<column_simple field_name="rel_sujet" table_name="relance" />

	<condition sql=" ( {s_date_realisation_min} IS NULL OR {relance.relance_date_realisation} >= {s_date_realisation_min} ) AND
						 ( {s_date_realisation_max} IS NULL OR {relance.relance_date_realisation} <= {s_date_realisation_max} ) AND
						 ( {s_moyen_comm} IS NULL OR {relance.rel_moyen_comm} = {s_moyen_comm} ) AND
						 ( {s_sujet} IS NULL OR {relance.rel_sujet} = {s_sujet} )">
		<field field_name="relance_date_realisation" table_name="relance" alias="relance.relance_date_realisation" />
		<field field_name="rel_moyen_comm" table_name="relance" alias="relance.rel_moyen_comm" />
		<field field_name="rel_sujet" table_name="relance" alias="relance.rel_sujet" />

		<variable alias="s_date_realisation_min" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_date_realisation_min" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_date_realisation_min" row="current" />
		</variable>
		<variable alias="s_date_realisation_max" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_date_realisation_max" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_date_realisation_max" row="current" />
		</variable>
		<variable alias="s_moyen_comm" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_moyen_comm" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_moyen_comm" row="current" />
		</variable>
		<variable alias="s_sujet" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_sujet" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_sujet" row="current" />
		</variable>
		
	</condition>
  
	<order_by sql="{relance.relance_date_realisation} desc">
		<field field_name="relance_date_realisation" alias="relance.relance_date_realisation" table_name="relance"/>
	</order_by>
	
</dataquery>

  	<column_simple field_name="arme_code" table_name="arm" />
	<column_simple field_name="arme_libelle_long" table_name="arm" />
  	<column_simple field_name="arme_libelle_court" table_name="arm" />
  	<column_simple field_name="arme_armee" table_name="arm" />

	<condition sql=" ( {s_code} IS NULL OR {arm.arme_code} LIKE CONCAT('%',{s_code},'%') ) AND
						 ( {s_libelle} IS NULL OR {arm.arme_libelle_long} LIKE CONCAT('%',{s_libelle},'%') OR {arm.arme_libelle_court} LIKE CONCAT('%',{s_libelle},'%') )">
		<field field_name="arme_code" table_name="arm" alias="arm.arme_code" />
		<field field_name="arme_libelle_court" table_name="arm" alias="arm.arme_libelle_court" />
		<field field_name="arme_libelle_long" table_name="arm" alias="arm.arme_libelle_long" />

		<variable alias="s_code" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_code" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_code" row="current" />

		<variable alias="s_libelle" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_libelle" />
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_libelle" row="current" />
		</variable>
		
	</condition>
  
	<order_by sql="{arm.arme_code} asc">
		<field field_name="arme_code" alias="arm.arme_code" table_name="arm"/>
	</order_by>
	
</dataquery>

<dataquery id="evt" table_name="{pj}_evt_data" varset_name="evt" table_alias="e">
	<column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="e"/>
  	<column sql="{dico.code}" alias="evt_rep_frec_inc" type="string">
        <field field_name="code" table_name="dico" alias="dico.code"/>
    </column>
    <column_simple field_name="evt_rep_inc_seuil1" table_name="e"/>
  	<column_simple field_name="evt_rep_inc_seuil2" table_name="e"/>
  	<column_simple field_name="evt_rep_inc_seuil3" table_name="e"/>	
    <column_simple field_name="evt_rep_freq_seuil1" table_name="e"/>
  	<column_simple field_name="evt_rep_freq_seuil2" table_name="e"/>
  	<column_simple field_name="evt_rep_freq_seuil3" table_name="e"/>
	<column sql="CONCAT({e.evt_code}, ' - ', {e.evt_libelle_court})" alias="label" type="string">
		<field table_name="e" field_name="evt_code" alias="e.evt_code"/>
		<field table_name="e" field_name="evt_libelle_court" alias="e.evt_libelle_court"/>
	</column>
  	<join detail_table="{pj}_dico_data" detail_alias="dico" sql="{dico.id_data} = {e.evt_rep_frec_inc}" type="left" mode="r">
		  <field table_name="dico" field_name="id_data" alias="dico.id_data"/>
		  <field table_name="e" field_name="evt_rep_frec_inc" alias="e.evt_rep_frec_inc"/>
	</join>
	<condition sql="( {search_code} IS NOT NULL AND {e.id_data} = {search_code} )">
		<field field_name="id_data" table_name="e" alias="e.id_data"/>
		<variable alias="search_code" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="search_code"/>
			<entry type="dataset" name="filter" field="id_evt" row="current"/>
		</variable>
	</condition>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="imports" table_name="{pj}_import_data" varset_name="import" table_alias="i" mode="r">
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="i"/>
  <column sql="DATE_FORMAT({i.iresum_debut}, '%d/%m/%Y %H:%i:%s')" alias="debut" type="string">
    <field field_name="iresum_debut" table_name="i" alias="i.iresum_debut"/>
  </column>
  <column sql="DATE_FORMAT({i.iresum_fin}, '%d/%m/%Y %H:%i:%s')" alias="fin" type="string">
    <field field_name="iresum_fin" table_name="i" alias="i.iresum_fin"/>
  </column>
  <column sql="CONCAT_WS(' ', {u.firstname}, {u.lastname})" alias="owner" type="string">
    <field field_name="firstname" table_name="u" alias="u.firstname"/>
    <field field_name="lastname" table_name="u" alias="u.lastname"/>
  </column>
  <column sql="COUNT({r.id_data})" type="integer" alias="nbre_rejets">
    <field field_name="id_data" table_name="r" alias="r.id_data"/>
  </column>
  <column_simple field_name="iresum_fichier" table_name="i"/>
  <column_simple field_name="iresum_nbre_insertions" table_name="i"/>
  <column_simple field_name="iresum_nbre_majs" table_name="i"/>
  <column_simple field_name="iresum_code_retour" table_name="i"/>
  <joins>
    <join type="left" sql="{i.id_data} = {r.id_import}" mode="r" detail_alias="r" detail_table="{pj}_rejet_data">
      <field field_name="id_import" table_name="r" alias="r.id_import"/>
      <field field_name="id_data" table_name="i" alias="i.id_data"/>
    </join>
    <join type="left" sql="{i.id_owner} = {u.id_group}" mode="r" detail_alias="u" detail_table="{pj}_user_data">
      <field field_name="id_group" table_name="u" alias="u.id_group"/>
      <field field_name="id_owner" table_name="i" alias="i.id_owner"/>
    </join>
  </joins>
  <condition sql="{_owner} IS NULL OR {i.id_owner} = {_owner}">
    <field field_name="id_owner" table_name="i" alias="i.id_owner"/>
    <variable alias="_owner" default="NULL">
      <entry type="param" name="owner"/>
      <entry type="dataset" name="search" field="owner" row="current"/>
    </variable>
  </condition>
  <condition sql="{_debut} IS NULL OR CAST({i.iresum_debut} as DATE) = {_debut}">
    <field field_name="iresum_debut" table_name="i" alias="i.iresum_debut"/>
    <variable alias="_debut" default="NULL">
      <entry type="param" name="debut"/>
      <entry type="dataset" name="search" field="debut" row="current"/>
    </variable>
  </condition>
  <group_by sql="{i.id_data}">
    <field field_name="id_data" table_name="i" alias="i.id_data"/>
  </group_by>
  <order_by sql="{i.iresum_debut} DESC">
    <field field_name="iresum_debut" alias="i.iresum_debut" table_name="i"/>
  </order_by>
</dataquery>

attrs.value:
<!-- Liste des roles de l'utilisateur courant -->
<dataquery id="current_roles" table_name="{pj}_pj_role" table_alias="r">
  <column sql="{id_role}" alias="id_role" type="primary_key">
    <field table_name="r" field_name="id_role" alias="id_role"  mode="rw"/>
  </column>
  <column sql="{label}" alias="label" type="string" length="100">
    <field table_name="r" field_name="label" alias="label"  mode="rw"/>
  </column>

  <join detail_table="{pj}_pj_group_link" detail_alias="gl" sql="{gl.id_role} = {r.id_role}" >
    <field table_name="gl" field_name="id_role" alias="gl.id_role"/>
    <field table_name="r" field_name="id_role" alias="r.id_role"/>
  </join>

  <condition sql="{gl.id_group} = {group_id}">
    <field table_name="gl" field_name="id_group" alias="gl.id_group"/>
    <variable alias="group_id" default="0">
      <entry type="user" name="group_id" />
    </variable>
  </condition>

  <group_by sql="{id_role}">
    <field table_name="r" field_name="id_role" alias="id_role"/>
  </group_by>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<!-- Liste des groups pour, le rôle choisi, de l'utilisateur courant -->
<dataquery id="current_groups" table_name="{pj}_pj_group" table_alias="g">
  <column sql="{g.id_group}" alias="id_group" type="primary_key">
    <field table_name="g" field_name="id_group" alias="g.id_group"  mode="rw"/>
  </column>
  <column sql="{g.name}" alias="name" type="string" length="100">
    <field table_name="g" field_name="name" alias="g.name"  mode="rw"/>
  </column>

  <join detail_table="{pj}_pj_group_link" detail_alias="gl" sql="{gl.id_group_parent} = {g.id_group}" >
    <field table_name="gl" field_name="id_group_parent" alias="gl.id_group_parent"/>
    <field table_name="g" field_name="id_group" alias="g.id_group"/>
  </join>
  
  <join detail_table="{pj}_struct_data" detail_alias="str" sql="{str.str_id_group} = {g.id_group}" >
    <field table_name="str" field_name="str_id_group" alias="str.str_id_group"/>
    <field table_name="g" field_name="id_group" alias="g.id_group"/>
  </join>

  <condition sql="{gl.id_group} = {group_id}">
    <field table_name="gl" field_name="id_group" alias="gl.id_group"/>
    <variable alias="group_id" default="0">
      <entry type="user" name="group_id" />
    </variable>
  </condition>

  <condition sql="{gl.id_role} = {id_role}">
    <field table_name="gl" field_name="id_role" alias="gl.id_role"/>
    <variable alias="id_role" default="0">
      <entry type="param" name="id_role" />
      <entry type="dataset" name="choice" row="current" field="id_role" />
    </variable>
  </condition>
  <!--  {gl.id_role} = 2 pour le role "declarant". Si le role est "declarant" on prend que les groupes/str déclarantes sinon on prend tout -->
  <!-- A repense -->
  <condition sql="IF( {gl.id_role} = 2, {str.str_declare} IN ( 0, 1 ), {str.str_declare} IN ( 0, 1 ) )">
    <field table_name="gl" field_name="id_role" alias="gl.id_role"/>
    <field table_name="str" field_name="str_declare" alias="str.str_declare"/>
  </condition>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="levels" table_name="{pj}_pj_group" table_alias="g">
  <column sql="{g.id_group}" alias="id_group" type="primary_key">
    <field field_name="id_group" table_name="g" alias="g.id_group" />
  </column>
  <column sql="CASE WHEN {gl4.id_group_parent} THEN 5 
               WHEN {gl3.id_group_parent} THEN 4 
               WHEN {gl2.id_group_parent} THEN 3 
               WHEN {gl1.id_group_parent} THEN 2 ELSE 1 END" alias="level" type="integer">
    <field field_name="id_group_parent" table_name="gl1" alias="gl1.id_group_parent" />
    <field field_name="id_group_parent" table_name="gl2" alias="gl2.id_group_parent" />
    <field field_name="id_group_parent" table_name="gl3" alias="gl3.id_group_parent" />
    <field field_name="id_group_parent" table_name="gl4" alias="gl4.id_group_parent" />
  </column>	  
  <joins>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_pj_group_link" detail_alias="gl1" sql="{g.id_group} = {gl1.id_group}" type="left" mode="r">
      <field table_name="g" field_name="id_group" alias="g.id_group"/>
      <field table_name="gl1" field_name="id_group" alias="gl1.id_group"/>
    </join>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_pj_group_link" detail_alias="gl2" sql="{gl1.id_group_parent} = {gl2.id_group}" type="left" mode="r">
      <field table_name="gl1" field_name="id_group_parent" alias="gl1.id_group_parent"/>
      <field table_name="gl2" field_name="id_group" alias="gl2.id_group"/>
    </join>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_pj_group_link" detail_alias="gl3" sql="{gl2.id_group_parent} = {gl3.id_group}" type="left" mode="r">
      <field table_name="gl2" field_name="id_group_parent" alias="gl2.id_group_parent"/>
      <field table_name="gl3" field_name="id_group" alias="gl3.id_group"/>
    </join>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_pj_group_link" detail_alias="gl4" sql="{gl3.id_group_parent} = {gl4.id_group}" type="left" mode="r">
      <field table_name="gl3" field_name="id_group_parent" alias="gl3.id_group_parent"/>
      <field table_name="gl4" field_name="id_group" alias="gl4.id_group"/>
    </join>
  </joins>
  <condition sql="{g.id_axis} = 1">
    <field field_name="id_axis" table_name="g" alias="g.id_axis" />
  </condition>
  <condition sql="{g.id_group} = {_perimetre}">
    <field field_name="id_group" table_name="g" alias="g.id_group" />
    <variable alias="_perimetre" default="1">
      <entry type="param" name="perimetre" />

  </condition>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="event" table_name="{pj}_evt_data" varset_name="evt" table_alias="evt">
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="evt"/>
  <column_simple field_name="evt_fsd" table_name="evt"/>
  <column sql="{dico.code}" alias="evt_rep_frec_inc" type="string">
    <field field_name="code" table_name="dico" alias="dico.code"/>
  </column>
  <column_simple field_name="evt_rep_inc_seuil1" table_name="evt"/>
  <column_simple field_name="evt_rep_inc_seuil2" table_name="evt"/>
  <column_simple field_name="evt_rep_inc_seuil3" table_name="evt"/>	
  <column_simple field_name="evt_rep_freq_seuil1" table_name="evt"/>
  <column_simple field_name="evt_rep_freq_seuil2" table_name="evt"/>
  <column_simple field_name="evt_rep_freq_seuil3" table_name="evt"/>
  <join detail_table="{pj}_dico_data" detail_alias="dico" sql="{dico.id_data} = {evt.evt_rep_frec_inc}" type="left" mode="r">
    <field table_name="dico" field_name="id_data" alias="dico.id_data"/>
    <field table_name="evt" field_name="evt_rep_frec_inc" alias="evt.evt_rep_frec_inc"/>
  </join>
  <condition sql="{evt.id_data} = {_event}">
    <field field_name="id_data" table_name="evt" alias="evt.id_data"/>
    <variable alias="_event" default="0">
      <entry type="param" name="event"/>
      <entry type="dataset" name="evt" row="current" field="id_data"/>
    </variable>
  </condition>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="evt" table_name="{pj}_evt_data" varset_name="evt" table_alias="e">
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="e"/>
  <column sql="CONCAT({e.evt_code}, ' - ', {e.evt_libelle_court})" alias="label" type="string">
    <field table_name="e" field_name="evt_code" alias="e.evt_code"/>
    <field table_name="e" field_name="evt_libelle_court" alias="e.evt_libelle_court"/>
  </column>
  <condition sql="( {search_code} IS NOT NULL AND {e.id_data} = {search_code} )">
    <field field_name="id_data" table_name="e" alias="e.id_data"/>
    <variable alias="search_code" default="NULL">
      <entry type="param" name="search_code"/>
      <entry type="dataset" name="req_simple" field="id_evt" row="current"/>
    </variable>
  </condition>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="label_event" table_name="{pj}_evt_data" varset_name="evt" table_alias="event">
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="event"/>
  <column_simple field_name="evt_code" table_name="event"/>
  <column_simple field_name="evt_famille" table_name="event"/>
  <column_simple field_name="evt_libelle_long" table_name="event"/>
  <column sql="{event.evt_famille}" alias="family">
    <field table_name="event" field_name="evt_famille" alias="event.evt_famille"/>
  </column>
  <column sql="CONCAT({event.evt_code}, ' - ', {event.evt_libelle_court})" alias="label" type="string">
    <field table_name="event" field_name="evt_code" alias="event.evt_code"/>
    <field table_name="event" field_name="evt_libelle_court" alias="event.evt_libelle_court"/>
  </column>
  <order_by sql="{event.evt_code}">
    <field field_name="evt_code" alias="event.evt_code" table_name="event"/>
  </order_by>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="groups_2" table_name="{pj}_pj_group" table_alias="g">
  <column sql="{id_group}" alias="id_group" type="primary_key" length="10">
    <field table_name="g" field_name="id_group" alias="id_group"/>
  </column>
  <column sql="{name}" alias="name" type="string" length="50">
    <field table_name="g" field_name="name" alias="name"/>
  </column>
  <column sql="{id_group_parent}" alias="id_group_parent" type="integer" length="10">
    <field table_name="l" field_name="id_group_parent" alias="id_group_parent"/>
  </column>

  <join detail_table="{pj}_pj_group_link" detail_alias="l" sql="{g.id_group}={l.id_group}">
    <field table_name="g" field_name="id_group" alias="g.id_group"/>
    <field table_name="l" field_name="id_group" alias="l.id_group"/>
  </join>

  <condition sql="{g.disabled} != 1" optional="false">
    <field field_name="disabled" alias="g.disabled" table_name="g"/>
  </condition>

  <condition sql="{g.id_axis} = 1">
    <field field_name="id_axis" alias="g.id_axis" table_name="g"/>    
  </condition>
  
  <!-- Pour palier au manque de liberté sur les order by -->
  <condition sql="1=1 ORDER BY l.id_group_parent IS NULL DESC, l.id_group_parent DESC" optional="false">
    <field table_name="l" field_name="id_group_parent" alias="l.id_group_parent"/>
  </condition>
  
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="events" table_name="{pj}_evt_data" varset_name="evt" table_alias="evt" editor_id="grjrsvktgl1462193026821">
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="evt"/>
  <column sql="CONCAT(RPAD({evt.evt_code}, 3, '_'), ' - ', {evt.evt_libelle_long})" alias="label" type="string">
    <field field_name="evt_code" table_name="evt" alias="evt.evt_code"/>
    <field field_name="evt_libelle_long" table_name="evt" alias="evt.evt_libelle_long"/>
  </column>
  <order_by sql="{evt.evt_code}">
    <field field_name="evt_code" table_name="evt" alias="evt.evt_code"/>
  </order_by>
</dataquery>

<dataquery id="event" table_name="{pj}_evt_data" varset_name="evt" table_alias="evt">

  <column_simple field_name="evt_fsd" table_name="evt"/>

    <variable alias="_event" default="0">

      <entry type="dataset" name="req_av" row="current" field="req_av_evt"/>
    </variable>
  </condition>
</dataquery>

<dataset id="search" type="filter" mute_refresh_event="true">
	<metadata>
		<fields>
			<field id="s_responsable" type="string" source="varset" default_label="Responsable">
				<varset name="user" field="lastname" />
			</field>
			<field id="s_statut" type="fkey_dico" default_label="Statut de la tâche">
				<fkey_dico dico_name="statut_tache"/>
			</field>
			<field id="s_date_prevue_min" type="date" default_label="Date prévue supérieure ou égale à" />
			<field id="s_date_prevue_max" type="date" default_label="Date prévue inférieure ou égale à" />
			<field id="s_date_realisation_min" type="date" default_label="Date de realisation supérieure ou égale à" />
			<field id="s_date_realisation_max" type="date" default_label="Date de realisation inférieure ou égale à" />
		</fields>
	</metadata>
</dataset>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="taches" table_name="{pj}_tache_data" varset_name="tache" table_alias="t">
	<join detail_table="{pj}_user_data" detail_alias="u" sql="{t.id_responsable}={u.id_data}" detail_varset_name="user">
		<field table_name="t" field_name="id_responsable" alias="t.id_responsable"/>
		<field table_name="u" field_name="id_data" alias="u.id_data"/>
	</join>
	<join detail_table="{pj}_dico_data" detail_alias="d" sql="{d.id_data}={u.grade_ssa}" detail_varset_name="dico">
		<field table_name="d" field_name="id_data" alias="d.id_data"/>
		<field table_name="u" field_name="grade_ssa" alias="u.grade_ssa"/>
	</join>
	<column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="t"/>
  	<column_simple field_name="id_alerte" table_name="t"/>
	<column_simple field_name="tache_titre" table_name="t"/>
	<column_simple field_name="tache_dateprev" table_name="t"/>
	<column_simple field_name="tache_datereal" table_name="t"/>
	<column_simple field_name="tache_temps_passe" table_name="t"/>
	<column_simple field_name="tache_statut" table_name="t"/>
	<column_simple field_name="id_responsable" table_name="t"/>
	<column sql="CONCAT_WS( ' ',{grade}, {firstname}, {lastname} )" alias="responsable" type="string" length="250">
		<field table_name="u" field_name="firstname" alias="firstname"/>
		<field table_name="u" field_name="lastname" alias="lastname"/>
		<field table_name="d" field_name="label" alias="grade"/>
	</column>

	<condition sql="{t.id_responsable} = {s_responsable}" optional="true">
		<field field_name="id_responsable" table_name="t" alias="t.id_responsable"/>
		<variable alias="s_responsable" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_responsable"/>
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_responsable" row="current"/>
		</variable>
	</condition>
	<condition sql="{t.tache_dateprev} > {s_date_prevue_min}" optional="true">
		<field field_name="tache_dateprev" table_name="t" alias="t.tache_dateprev"/>
		<variable alias="s_date_prevue_min" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_date_prevue_min"/>
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_date_prevue_min" row="current"/>
		</variable>
	</condition>
	<condition sql="{t.tache_dateprev} < {s_date_prevue_max}" optional="true">
		<field field_name="tache_dateprev" table_name="t" alias="t.tache_dateprev"/>
		<variable alias="s_date_prevue_max" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_date_prevue_max"/>
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_date_prevue_max" row="current"/>
		</variable>
	</condition>
	<condition sql="{t.tache_datereal} > {s_date_realisation_min}" optional="true">
		<field field_name="tache_datereal" table_name="t" alias="t.tache_datereal"/>
		<variable alias="s_date_realisation_min" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_date_realisation_min"/>
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_date_realisation_min" row="current"/>
		</variable>
	</condition>
	<condition sql="{t.tache_datereal} < {s_date_realisation_max}" optional="true">
		<field field_name="tache_datereal" table_name="t" alias="t.tache_datereal"/>
		<variable alias="s_date_realisation_max" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_date_realisation_max"/>
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_date_realisation_max" row="current"/>
		</variable>
	</condition>
	<condition sql="{t.tache_statut} = {s_statut}" optional="true">
		<field field_name="tache_statut" table_name="t" alias="t.tache_statut"/>
		<variable alias="s_statut" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="s_statut"/>
			<entry type="dataset" name="search" field="s_statut" row="current"/>
		</variable>
	</condition>

	<condition sql="{t.id_alerte} = {param_id_alerte}" optional="false">
		<field field_name="id_alerte" table_name="t" alias="t.id_alerte"/>
		<variable alias="param_id_alerte" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="id_data"/>
		</variable>
	</condition>
</dataquery>

		<variable alias="param_id_alerte" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="id_data"/>
		</variable>
	</condition>
</dataquery>

<dataquery id="contacts" table_name="{pj}_alerte_user_data" varset_name="alerte_user" table_alias="au" mode="r">
	<join detail_table="{pj}_user_data" detail_alias="u" sql="{au.id_user}={u.id_data}" detail_varset_name="user" mode="r">
		<field table_name="au" field_name="id_user" alias="au.id_user"/>
		<field table_name="u" field_name="id_data" alias="u.id_data"/>
	</join>
  	<join detail_table="{pj}_dico_data" detail_alias="d" sql="{d.id_data}={u.grade_ssa}" detail_varset_name="dico" mode="r">
		<field table_name="d" field_name="id_data" alias="d.id_data"/>
		<field table_name="u" field_name="grade_ssa" alias="u.grade_ssa"/>
	</join>

  
	<column sql="{au.id_user}" alias="id_user" type="primary_key">
		<field table_name="au" field_name="id_user" alias="au.id_user"/>
	</column>

	<column sql="CONCAT_WS( ' ',{grade}, {firstname}, {lastname} )" alias="label" type="string" length="250">
		<field table_name="u" field_name="firstname" alias="firstname"/>
		<field table_name="u" field_name="lastname" alias="lastname"/>
		<field table_name="d" field_name="label" alias="grade"/>
	</column>

  <condition sql="{au.id_alerte} = {param_id_alerte}">
		<field field_name="id_alerte" table_name="au" alias="au.id_alerte"/>
		<variable alias="param_id_alerte" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="id_data"/>
		</variable>
	</condition>
	<group_by sql="{au.id_user}">
		<field field_name="id_user" alias="au.id_user" table_name="au"/>
	</group_by>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="search_user" table_name="{pj}_user_data" varset_name="user" table_alias="s_user">
	<join detail_table="{pj}_alerte_user_data" detail_alias="au" sql="{au.id_user}={u.id_data} AND {param_id_alerte} = {id_alerte}" detail_varset_name="alerte_user">
		<field table_name="s_user" field_name="id_data" alias="u.id_data"/>
		<field table_name="au" field_name="id_user" alias="au.id_user"/>
		<field field_name="id_alerte" table_name="au" alias="id_alerte"/>
		<variable alias="param_id_alerte" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="id_data"/>
			<entry type="dataset" name="alerte" field="id_data" row="current"/>
		</variable>
	</join>
	<join detail_table="{pj}_dico_data" detail_alias="d" sql="{d.id_data}={u.grade_ssa}" detail_varset_name="dico" mode="r">
		<field table_name="d" field_name="id_data" alias="d.id_data"/>
		<field table_name="s_user" field_name="grade_ssa" alias="u.grade_ssa"/>
	</join>
	
	<!-- colonnes à insérer dans le dataset cible -->
	<column sql="{u.id_data}" alias="id_user" type="integer">
		<field table_name="s_user" field_name="id_data" alias="u.id_data"/>
	</column>
	<column sql="{id_alerte}" alias="id_alerte" type="integer">
		<variable alias="id_alerte" target_column="id_alerte" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="id_data"/>
			<entry type="dataset" name="alerte" field="id_data" row="current"/>
		</variable>
	</column>
  	<column_simple field_name="firstname" table_name="s_user"/>
	<column_simple field_name="lastname" table_name="s_user"/>
	<column_simple field_name="fonction" table_name="s_user"/>
	<column_simple field_name="organisme" table_name="s_user"/>
	<column_simple field_name="tel_1" table_name="s_user"/>
	<column_simple field_name="status" table_name="s_user"/>
	<column_simple field_name="email" table_name="s_user"/>
	<column_simple field_name="grade_ssa" table_name="s_user"/>
	<column_simple field_name="label" table_name="d"/>
	<column sql="CONCAT_WS( ' ',{grade}, {firstname}, {lastname} )" alias="nom" type="string" length="200">
		<field table_name="s_user" field_name="firstname" alias="firstname"/>
		<field table_name="s_user" field_name="lastname" alias="lastname"/>
		<field table_name="d" field_name="label" alias="grade"/>
	</column>


	<!-- Affichage des résultats de la recherche -->
	<column sql="CONCAT_WS( ' ',{grade}, {firstname}, {lastname} )" alias="body" type="string" length="200">
		<field table_name="s_user" field_name="firstname" alias="firstname"/>
		<field table_name="s_user" field_name="lastname" alias="lastname"/>
		<field table_name="d" field_name="label" alias="grade"/>
	</column>

	<condition sql="({firstname} LIKE CONCAT({search_string}, '%') OR {lastname} LIKE CONCAT({search_string}, '%') OR {username} LIKE CONCAT({search_string}, '%' ))">
		<field field_name="firstname" table_name="s_user" alias="firstname"/>
		<field field_name="lastname" table_name="s_user" alias="lastname"/>
		<field field_name="username" table_name="s_user" alias="username"/>
		<variable alias="search_string" default="NULL" type="search">
			<entry type="param" name="search_string"/>
		</variable>
	</condition>

	<condition sql="{au.id_data} IS NULL">
		<field field_name="id_data" table_name="au" alias="au.id_data"/>
	</condition>
</dataquery>
