<dataquery id="contacts" table_name="{pj}_alerte_user_data" varset_name="alerte_user" table_alias="c">
	<join detail_table="{pj}_user_data" detail_alias="u" sql="{c.id_user}={u.id_data}" detail_varset_name="user">
		<field table_name="c" field_name="id_user" alias="c.id_user"/>
		<field table_name="u" field_name="id_data" alias="u.id_data"/>
	</join>
	<join detail_table="{pj}_dico_data" detail_alias="d" sql="{d.id_data}={u.grade_ssa}" detail_varset_name="dico">
		<field table_name="d" field_name="id_data" alias="d.id_data"/>
		<field table_name="u" field_name="grade_ssa" alias="u.grade_ssa"/>
	</join>

	<column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="c"/>
	<column_simple field_name="id_alerte" table_name="c"/>
	<column_simple field_name="id_user" table_name="c"/>
	<column_simple field_name="firstname" table_name="u"/>
	<column_simple field_name="lastname" table_name="u"/>

	<column_simple field_name="fonction" table_name="u"/>
	<column_simple field_name="organisme" table_name="u"/>
	<column_simple field_name="tel_1" table_name="u"/>
	<column_simple field_name="status" table_name="u"/>
	<column_simple field_name="email" table_name="u"/>
	<column_simple field_name="grade_ssa" table_name="u"/>
	<column_simple field_name="label" table_name="d"/>
	<column sql="CONCAT_WS( ' ',{grade}, {firstname}, {lastname} )" alias="nom" type="string" length="250">
		<field table_name="u" field_name="firstname" alias="firstname"/>
		<field table_name="u" field_name="lastname" alias="lastname"/>
		<field table_name="d" field_name="label" alias="grade"/>
	</column>

	<condition sql="{id_alerte}={param_id_alerte}">
		<field field_name="id_alerte" table_name="c" alias="id_alerte"/>
		<variable alias="param_id_alerte" default="NULL">
			<entry type="param" name="id_data"/>
		</variable>
	</condition>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="alarmes" table_name="{pj}_alarme_data" varset_name="alarme" table_alias="a" range="20" begin="0">
  <column_simple field_name="id_data" table_name="a"/>
  <column_simple field_name="ala_annee" table_name="a"/>
  <column_simple field_name="ala_semaine" table_name="a"/>
  <column sql="CONCAT({e.evt_code}, ' - ', {e.evt_libelle_court})" alias="event" type="string">
    <field table_name="e" field_name="evt_code" alias="e.evt_code"/>
    <field table_name="e" field_name="evt_libelle_court" alias="e.evt_libelle_court"/>
  </column>
  <column sql="CONCAT({s.str_code_cespa}, ' - ', {s.str_libelle_court})" alias="struct" type="string">
    <field table_name="s" field_name="str_code_cespa" alias="s.str_code_cespa"/>
    <field table_name="s" field_name="str_libelle_court" alias="s.str_libelle_court"/>
  </column>

  <column_simple field_name="ala_mode_detec" table_name="a"/>
  <column_simple field_name="ala_statut" table_name="a"/>

  <column sql="IF({a.id_alerte} IS NOT NULL, 'Oui', '')" alias="ala_has_alert" type="string">
    <field table_name="a" field_name="id_alerte" alias="a.id_alerte"/>
  </column>	  
  <joins>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_evt_data" detail_alias="e" sql="{a.id_evt}={e.id_data}" type="inner" detail_varset_name="evt" mode="r">
      <field table_name="a" field_name="id_evt" alias="a.id_evt"/>
      <field table_name="e" field_name="id_data" alias="e.id_data"/>
    </join>
    <join detail_table="{pj}_struct_data" detail_alias="s" sql="{a.id_struct}={s.id_data}" type="inner" detail_varset_name="struct" mode="r">
      <field table_name="a" field_name="id_struct" alias="a.id_struct"/>
      <field table_name="s" field_name="id_data" alias="s.id_data"/>
    </join>
  </joins>

  <condition sql="{_id_evt} = {a.id_evt}" optional="true">
    <field table_name="a" field_name="id_evt" alias="a.id_evt"/>
    <variable alias="_id_evt" default="NULL">
      <entry type="param" name="id_evt"/>
      <entry type="dataset" name="search" field="id_evt" row="current"/>
    </variable>
  </condition>

  <condition sql="{_id_group} = {s.str_id_group}" optional="true">
    <field table_name="s" field_name="str_id_group" alias="s.str_id_group"/>
    <variable alias="_id_group" default="NULL">
      <entry type="param" name="id_group"/>
      <entry type="dataset" name="search" field="id_group" row="current"/>
    </variable>
  </condition>

  <condition sql="{_annee} = {a.ala_annee}" optional="true">
    <field table_name="a" field_name="ala_annee" alias="a.ala_annee"/>
    <variable alias="_annee" default="NULL">
      <entry type="param" name="annee"/>
      <entry type="dataset" name="search" field="annee" row="current"/>
    </variable>
  </condition>

  <condition sql="{_semaine} = {a.ala_semaine}" optional="true">
    <field table_name="a" field_name="ala_semaine" alias="a.ala_semaine"/>
    <variable alias="_semaine" default="NULL">
      <entry type="param" name="semaine"/>
      <entry type="dataset" name="search" field="semaine" row="current"/>
    </variable>
  </condition>

  <condition sql="{_mode_detection} = {a.ala_mode_detec}" optional="true">
    <field table_name="a" field_name="ala_mode_detec" alias="a.ala_mode_detec"/>
    <variable alias="_mode_detection" default="NULL">
      <entry type="param" name="mode_detection"/>
      <entry type="dataset" name="search" field="mode_detection" row="current"/>
    </variable>
  </condition>

  <condition sql="{_statut_alarme} = {a.ala_statut}" optional="true">
    <field table_name="a" field_name="ala_statut" alias="a.ala_statut"/>
    <variable alias="_statut_alarme" default="NULL">
      <entry type="param" name="statut_alarme"/>
      <entry type="dataset" name="search" field="statut_alarme" row="current"/>
    </variable>
  </condition>

  <condition sql="( {_has_alerte} = 1 AND {a.id_alerte} IS NOT NULL ) OR ( {_has_alerte} = 0 AND {a.id_alerte} IS NULL )" optional="true">
    <field table_name="a" field_name="id_alerte" alias="a.id_alerte"/>
    <variable alias="_has_alerte" default="NULL">
      <entry type="param" name="has_alerte"/>
      <entry type="dataset" name="search" field="has_alerte" row="current"/>
    </variable>
  </condition>
  
  <order_by sql="{a.ala_annee}">
    <field table_name="a" field_name="ala_annee" alias="a.ala_annee"/>
  </order_by>
  
  <order_by sql="{a.ala_semaine}">
    <field table_name="a" field_name="ala_semaine" alias="a.ala_semaine"/>
  </order_by>
  
  <order_by sql="{e.evt_code}">
    <field field_name="evt_code" alias="e.evt_code" table_name="e"/>
  </order_by>

</dataquery>

attrs.name: form[name]
attrs.value: form_detect_alarme

Specs : Ici, un formulaire avec les champs suivants :
  • Évènement
  • Année
  • Semaine
  • Mode de détection (groupement ou analyse)

attrs.name: form.widget
attrs.value:
<form_row class="col-md-4">
  <label dataset="search" field="year" class="col-md-4"/>
  <value dataset="search" field="year" mode="rw" class="col-md-8"/>
</form_row>
<form_row class="col-md-4">
  <label dataset="search" field="week" class="col-md-4"/>
  <value dataset="search" field="week" mode="rw" class="col-md-8"/>
</form_row>
<form_row class="col-md-4">
  <button label="Lancer la détection" action="exit">
    <redirection module="alerte" ctrl="detection" action="group" />
  </button>
</form_row>

Specs : Lorsque l'utilisateur cliquera sur ce bouton, la détection serait lancée avec les paramètres saisis par l'utilisateur. L'objectif est de tester la détection sans avoir à lancer une tâche planifiée.
Specs : Dans l'idéal, on aurait ici les logs de la détection. Leur mise en forme peut être brute. Le but est seulement de faciliter les tests et le debug.

attrs.name: form.dataquery
attrs.value:
<dataquery id="modes" table_name="{pj}_dico_data" table_alias="d">
  <column sql="{d.code}" alias="code" type="primary_key">
    <field field_name="code" table_name="d" alias="d.code"/>
  </column>
  <column sql="{d.label}" alias="label" type="string">
    <field field_name="label" table_name="d" alias="d.label" />
  </column>
  <condition sql="{d.dico_name} = 'mode_detection' AND {d.code} IN ('GC', 'ST')">
    <field field_name="dico_name" table_name="d" alias="d.dico_name"/>
    <field field_name="code" table_name="d" alias="d.code"/>
  </condition>
</dataquery>

attrs.name: form.dataset
attrs.value:
<dataset id="search" type="filter" mute_refresh_event="true">
	<metadata>
		<fields>
			<field id="mode" type="string" default_label="Mode de détection" mandatory="true">
				<string length="2" />
			</field>
			<field id="year" type="integer" default_label="Année" mandatory="true">
				<integer min="2010" max="2020" />
			</field>
			<field id="week" type="string" default_label="Semaine" mandatory="true">
				<string length="2" />
			</field>
		</fields>
	</metadata>
</dataset>
